 22 /**
 23  * Creates a new compose view. The view does not display itself on construction.
 24  * @constructor
 25  * @class
 26  * This class provides a form for composing a message.
 27  *
 28  * @author Conrad Damon
 29  * 
 30  * @param {DwtControl}		parent			the element that created this view
 31  * @param {ZmController}	controller		the controller managing this view
 32  * @param {constant}		composeMode 	passed in so detached window knows which mode to be in on startup
 33  * 
 34  * @extends		DwtComposite
 35  * 
 36  * @private
 37  */
 38 ZmComposeView = function(parent, controller, composeMode) {
 39 
 40 	if (arguments.length === 0) { return; }
 41 		
 42 	this.TEMPLATE = "mail.Message#Compose";
 43 	this._view = controller.getCurrentViewId();
 44 	this._sessionId = controller.getSessionId();
 45 
 46 	DwtComposite.call(this, {parent:parent, className:"ZmComposeView", posStyle:Dwt.ABSOLUTE_STYLE, id:ZmId.getViewId(this._view)});
 47 
 48 	ZmComposeView.NOTIFY_ACTION_MAP = {};
 49 	ZmComposeView.NOTIFY_ACTION_MAP[ZmOperation.REPLY_ACCEPT]		= ZmOperation.REPLY_ACCEPT_NOTIFY;
 50 	ZmComposeView.NOTIFY_ACTION_MAP[ZmOperation.REPLY_DECLINE]		= ZmOperation.REPLY_DECLINE_NOTIFY;
 51 	ZmComposeView.NOTIFY_ACTION_MAP[ZmOperation.REPLY_TENTATIVE]	= ZmOperation.REPLY_TENTATIVE_NOTIFY;
 52 
 53 	ZmComposeView.MOVE_TO_FIELD = {};
 54 	ZmComposeView.MOVE_TO_FIELD[ZmOperation.MOVE_TO_TO]		= AjxEmailAddress.TO;
 55 	ZmComposeView.MOVE_TO_FIELD[ZmOperation.MOVE_TO_CC]		= AjxEmailAddress.CC;
 56 	ZmComposeView.MOVE_TO_FIELD[ZmOperation.MOVE_TO_BCC]	= AjxEmailAddress.BCC;
 57 		
 58 	this._onMsgDataChange = this._onMsgDataChange.bind(this);
 59 
 60 	this._controller = controller;
 61 
 62 	var recipParams = {};
 63 	recipParams.resetContainerSizeMethod	= this._resetBodySize.bind(this);
 64 	recipParams.enableContainerInputs		= this.enableInputs.bind(this);
 65 	recipParams.reenter						= this.reEnableDesignMode.bind(this);
 66 	recipParams.contactPopdownListener		= this._controller._dialogPopdownListener;
 67 	recipParams.contextId					= this._controller.getCurrentViewId();
 68 
 69 	this._recipients = new ZmRecipients(recipParams);
 70 
 71 	this._initialize(composeMode);
 72 
 73 	// make sure no unnecessary scrollbars show up
 74 	this.setScrollStyle(Dwt.CLIP);
 75 };
 76

130 /**
131  * Sets the current view, based on the given action. The compose form is
132  * created and laid out and everything is set up for interaction with the user.
133  *
134  * @param {Hash}		params			a hash of parameters:
135  * @param {constant}	action				new message, reply, forward, or an invite action
136  * @param {ZmMailMsg}	msg					the original message (reply/forward), or address (new message)
137  * @param {ZmIdentity}	identity			identity of sender
138  * @param {String}		toOverride			To: addresses (optional)
139  * @param {String}		ccOverride			Cc: addresses (optional)
140  * @param {String}		subjectOverride		subject for new msg (optional)
141  * @param {String}		extraBodyText		text to prepend to body
142  * @param {Array}		msgIds				list of msg Id's to be added as attachments
143  * @param {String}		accountName			on-behalf-of From address
144  */
145 ZmComposeView.prototype.set =
146 function(params) {
147 
148 	var action = this._action = params.action;
149 	this._origAction = this._action;
150 	if (this._msg) {
151 		this._msg.onChange = null;
152 	}
153 
154 	this._isIncludingOriginalAttachments = false;
155 	this._originalAttachmentsInitialized = false;
156 
157 	this._acceptFolderId = params.acceptFolderId;
158 	var msg = this._msg = this._origMsg = params.msg;
159 	var oboMsg = msg || (params.selectedMessages && params.selectedMessages.length && params.selectedMessages[0]);
160 	var obo = this._getObo(params.accountName, oboMsg);
161 	if (msg) {
162 		msg.onChange = this._onMsgDataChange;
163 	}
164 
165 	// list of msg Id's to add as attachments
166 	this._msgIds = params.msgIds;
167 
168 	this.reset(true);
169 
170 	this._setFromSelect(msg);
171 
172 	if (obo) {
173 		this.identitySelect.setSelectedValue(obo);
174 		this._controller.resetIdentity(obo);
175 	}
176 
177 	if (params.identity) {
178 		if (this.identitySelect) {
179 			this.identitySelect.setSelectedValue(params.identity.id);
180 			this._controller.resetIdentity(params.identity.id);
181 		}
182 		if (appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.SIGNATURES_ENABLED) || appCtxt.multiAccounts) {
183 			var selected = this._getSignatureIdForAction(params.identity) || "";
184 			var account = appCtxt.multiAccounts && this.getFromAccount();
185 			this._controller.resetSignatureToolbar(selected, account);
186 		}
187 	}
188 
189 	this._recipients.setup();
190 
191 	if (!ZmComposeController.IS_FORWARD[action]) {
192 		// populate fields based on the action and user prefs
193 		this._setAddresses(action, AjxEmailAddress.TO, params.toOverride);
194 		if (params.ccOverride) {
195 			this._setAddresses(action, AjxEmailAddress.CC, params.ccOverride);
196 		}
197 		if (params.bccOverride) {
198 			this._setAddresses(action, AjxEmailAddress.BCC, params.bccOverride);
199 		}
200 	}
201 
202 	this._setSubject(action, msg || (params.selectedMessages && params.selectedMessages[0]), params.subjOverride);
203 	this._setBody(action, msg, params.extraBodyText);
204 	if (params.extraBodyText) {
205 		this._isDirty = true;
206 	}
207 
208     //Force focus on body only for reply and replyAll
209     if (ZmComposeController.IS_REPLY[action]) {
210         this._moveCaretOnTimer(params.extraBodyText ? params.extraBodyText.length : 0);
211     }
212 
213 	if (action !== ZmOperation.FORWARD_ATT) {
214 		this._saveExtraMimeParts();
215 	}
216 
217 	// save form state (to check for change later)
218 	if (this._composeMode === Dwt.HTML) {
219 		var ta = new AjxTimedAction(this, this._setFormValue);
220 		AjxTimedAction.scheduleAction(ta, 10);
221 	} else {
222 		this._setFormValue();
223 	}
224 	// Force focus on the TO field
225 	if (!ZmComposeController.IS_REPLY[action]) {
226 		appCtxt.getKeyboardMgr().grabFocus(this._recipients.getField(AjxEmailAddress.TO));
227 	}
228 };
229 
230 ZmComposeView.prototype._getObo =
231 function(obo, msg) {
232 	if (msg) {
233 		var folder = !obo ? appCtxt.getById(msg.folderId) : null;
234 		obo = (folder && folder.isRemote()) ? folder.getOwner() : null;
235 
236 		// check if this is a draft that was originally composed obo
237 		var isFromDataSource = msg.identity && msg.identity.isFromDataSource;
238 		if (!obo && msg.isDraft && !appCtxt.multiAccounts && !isFromDataSource && !appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.ALLOW_ANY_FROM_ADDRESS)) {
239 			var ac = window.parentAppCtxt || window.appCtxt;
240 			var from = msg.getAddresses(AjxEmailAddress.FROM).get(0);
241 			if (from && (from.address.toLowerCase() !== ac.accountList.mainAccount.getEmail().toLowerCase()) && !appCtxt.isMyAddress(from.address.toLowerCase())) {
242 				obo = from.address;
243 			}
244 		}
245 	}
246 	return obo;
247 };
248 
249 ZmComposeView.prototype._saveExtraMimeParts =
250 function() {
251 		
252 	var bodyParts = this._msg ? this._msg.getBodyParts() : [];
253 	for (var i = 0; i < bodyParts.length; i++) {
254 		var bodyPart = bodyParts[i];
255 		var contentType = bodyPart.contentType;
256 
257 		if (contentType === ZmMimeTable.TEXT_PLAIN) { continue; }
258 		if (contentType === ZmMimeTable.TEXT_HTML) { continue; }
259 		if (ZmMimeTable.isRenderableImage(contentType) && bodyPart.contentDisposition === "inline") { continue; } // bug: 28741
260 
261 		var mimePart = new ZmMimePart();
262 		mimePart.setContentType(contentType);
263 		mimePart.setContent(bodyPart.getContent());
264 		this.addMimePart(mimePart);
265 	}
266 };
267 
268 /**
269  * Called automatically by the attached ZmMailMsg object when data is
270  * changed, in order to support Zimlets modify subject or other values
271  * (bug: 10540)
272  * 
273  * @private
274  */
275 ZmComposeView.prototype._onMsgDataChange =
276 function(what, val) {
277 	if (what === "subject") {
278 		this._subjectField.value = val;
279 		this.updateTabTitle();
280 	}
281 };

298 /**
299  * Gets the title.
300  * 
301  * @return	{String}	the title
302  */
303 ZmComposeView.prototype.getTitle =
304 function() {
305 	var text;
306 	if (ZmComposeController.IS_REPLY[this._action]) {
307 		text = ZmMsg.reply;
308 	} else if (ZmComposeController.IS_FORWARD[this._action]) {
309 		text = ZmMsg.forward;
310 	} else {
311 		text = ZmMsg.compose;
312 	}
313 	return [ZmMsg.zimbraTitle, text].join(": ");
314 };

357 // returns list of attachment field values (used by detachCompose)
358 ZmComposeView.prototype.getAttFieldValues =
359 function() {
360 	var attList = [];
361 	var atts = document.getElementsByName(ZmComposeView.UPLOAD_FIELD_NAME);
362 
363 	for (var i = 0; i < atts.length; i++) {
364 		attList.push(atts[i].value);
365 	}
366 
367 	return attList;
368 };
369 
370 ZmComposeView.prototype.setBackupForm =
371 function() {
372 	this.backupForm = this._backupForm();
373 };
374 
375 /**
376 * Saves *ALL* form value data to test against whether user made any changes
377 * since canceling SendMsgRequest. If user attempts to send again, we compare
378 * form data with this value and if not equal, send a new UID otherwise, re-use.
379 * 
380 * @private
381 */
382 ZmComposeView.prototype._backupForm =
383 function() {
384 	var val = this._formValue(true, true);
385 
386 	// keep track of attachments as well
387 	var atts = document.getElementsByName(ZmComposeView.UPLOAD_FIELD_NAME);
388 	for (var i = 0; i < atts.length; i++) {
389 		if (atts[i].value.length) {
390 			val += atts[i].value;
391 		}
392 	}
393 
394 	// keep track of "uploaded" attachments as well :/
395 	val += this._getForwardAttIds(ZmComposeView.FORWARD_ATT_NAME + this._sessionId).join("");
396 	val += this._getForwardAttIds(ZmComposeView.FORWARD_MSG_NAME + this._sessionId).join("");
397 
398 	return val;
399 };

411 
412 ZmComposeView.prototype._isInline =
413 function(msg) {
414 
415 	if (this._attachDialog) {
416 		return this._attachDialog.isInline();
417 	}
418 
419 	msg = msg || this._origMsg;
420 
421 	if (msg && this._msgAttId && msg.id === this._msgAttId) {
422 		return false;
423 	}
424 
425 	if (msg && msg.attachments) {
426 		var atts = msg.attachments;
427 		for (var i = 0; i < atts.length; i++) {
428 			if (atts[i].contentId) {
429 				return true;
430 			}
431 		}
432 	}
433 
434 	return false;
435 };
436

438 ZmComposeView.prototype._addReplyAttachments =
439 function(){
440 	this._showForwardField(this._msg, ZmComposeView.ADD_ORIG_MSG_ATTS);
441 };
442 
443 ZmComposeView.prototype._handleInlineAtts =
444 function(msg, handleInlineDocs){
445 
446 	var handled = false, ci, cid, dfsrc, inlineAtt, attached = {};
447 
448 	var idoc = this._htmlEditor._getIframeDoc();
449 	var images = idoc ? idoc.getElementsByTagName("img") : [];
450 	for (var i = 0; i < images.length; i++) {
451 		dfsrc = images[i].getAttribute("dfsrc") || images[i].getAttribute("data-mce-src") || images[i].src;
452 		if (dfsrc) {
453 			if (dfsrc.substring(0,4) === "cid:") {
454 				cid = dfsrc.substring(4).replace("%40","@");
455 				var docpath = images[i].getAttribute("doc");
456 				var mid = images[i].getAttribute('data-zimbra-id');
457 				var part = images[i].getAttribute('data-zimbra-part');
458 
459 				if (docpath){
460 					msg.addInlineDocAttachment(cid, null, docpath);
461 					handled = true;
462 				} else if (mid && part) {
463 					images[i].removeAttribute('data-zimbra-id');
464 					images[i].removeAttribute('data-zimbra-part');
465 					msg.addInlineAttachmentId(cid, mid, part, true);
466 					handled = true;
467 				} else {
468 					ci = "<" + cid + ">";
469 					inlineAtt = msg.findInlineAtt(ci);
470 					if (!inlineAtt && this._msg) {
471 						inlineAtt = this._msg.findInlineAtt(ci);
472 					}
473 						if (inlineAtt) {
474 						var id = [cid, inlineAtt.part].join("_");
475 						if (!attached[id]) {
476 							msg.addInlineAttachmentId(cid, null, inlineAtt.part);
477 							handled = true;
478 							attached[id] = true;
479 						}
480 					}
481 				}
482 			}
483 		}
484 	}
485 
486 	return handled;
487 };
488 
489 ZmComposeView.prototype._generateCid =
490 function() {
491 	var timeStr = "" + new Date().getTime();
492 	var hash = AjxSHA1.hex_sha1(timeStr + Dwt.getNextId());
493 	return hash + "@zimbra";
494 };
495 
496 /**
497 * Returns the message from the form, after some basic input validation.
498 */
499 ZmComposeView.prototype.getMsg =
500 function(attId, isDraft, dummyMsg, forceBail, contactId) {
501 
502 	// Check destination addresses.
503 	var addrs = this._recipients.collectAddrs();
504 
505 	// Any addresses at all provided? If not, bail.
506 	if ((!isDraft || forceBail) && !addrs.gotAddress) {
507 		this.enableInputs(false);
508 		var msgDialog = appCtxt.getMsgDialog();
509 		msgDialog.setMessage(ZmMsg.noAddresses, DwtMessageDialog.CRITICAL_STYLE);
510 		msgDialog.popup();
511 		msgDialog.registerCallback(DwtDialog.OK_BUTTON, this._okCallback, this);
512 		this.enableInputs(true);
513 		return;
514 	}
515 
516 	var cd = appCtxt.getOkCancelMsgDialog();
517 	cd.reset();
518 
519 	// Is there a subject? If not, ask the user if they want to send anyway.
520 	var subject = AjxStringUtil.trim(this._subjectField.value);
521 	if ((!isDraft || forceBail) && subject.length === 0 && !this._noSubjectOkay) {
522 		this.enableInputs(false);
523 		cd.setMessage(ZmMsg.compSubjectMissing, DwtMessageDialog.WARNING_STYLE);
524 		cd.registerCallback(DwtDialog.OK_BUTTON, this._noSubjectOkCallback, this, cd);
525 		cd.registerCallback(DwtDialog.CANCEL_BUTTON, this._noSubjectCancelCallback, this, cd);
526 		cd.popup();
527 		return;
528 	}
529 
530 	// Any bad addresses?  If there are bad ones, ask the user if they want to send anyway.
531 	if ((!isDraft || forceBail) && addrs[ZmComposeView.BAD].size() && !this._badAddrsOkay) {
532 		this.enableInputs(false);
533 		var bad = AjxStringUtil.htmlEncode(addrs[ZmComposeView.BAD].toString(AjxEmailAddress.SEPARATOR));
534 		var msg = AjxMessageFormat.format(ZmMsg.compBadAddresses, bad);
535 		cd.setMessage(msg, DwtMessageDialog.WARNING_STYLE);
536 		cd.registerCallback(DwtDialog.OK_BUTTON, this._badAddrsOkCallback, this, cd);
537 		cd.registerCallback(DwtDialog.CANCEL_BUTTON, this._badAddrsCancelCallback, this, [addrs.badType, cd]);
538 		cd.setVisible(true); // per fix for bug 3209
539 		cd.popup();
540 		return;
541 	} else {
542 		this._badAddrsOkay = false;
543 	}
544 
545 	// Mandatory Spell Check
546 	if ((!isDraft || forceBail) && appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.SPELL_CHECK_ENABLED) && 
547 		appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.MAIL_MANDATORY_SPELLCHECK) && !this._spellCheckOkay) {
548 		if (this._htmlEditor.checkMisspelledWords(this._spellCheckShield.bind(this), null, this._spellCheckErrorShield.bind(this))) {
549 			return;
550 		}
551 	} else {
552 		this._spellCheckOkay = false;
553 	}
554 
555 	// Create Msg Object - use dummy if provided
556 	var msg = dummyMsg || (new ZmMailMsg());
557 	msg.setSubject(subject);
558 
559 	var zeroSizedAttachments = false;
560 	// handle Inline Attachments
561 	if (attId && (this._getIsAttInline() || (this._attachDialog && this._attachDialog.isInline()) || attId.clipboardPaste)) {
562 		for (var i = 0; i < attId.length; i++) {
563 			var att = attId[i];
564 			if (att.s === 0) {
565 				zeroSizedAttachments = true;
566 				continue;
567 			}
568 			var contentType = att.ct;
569 			if (contentType && contentType.indexOf("image") !== -1) {
570 				var cid = this._generateCid();
571 				if( att.hasOwnProperty("id") ){
572 					this._htmlEditor.replaceImage(att.id, "cid:" + cid);
573 				}
574 				else {
575 					this._htmlEditor.insertImage("cid:" + cid, AjxEnv.isIE);
576 				}
577 				msg.addInlineAttachmentId(cid, att.aid);
578 			} else {
579 				msg.addAttachmentId(att.aid);
580 			}
581 		}
582 	} else if (attId && typeof attId !== "string") {
583 		for (var i = 0; i < attId.length; i++) {
584 			if (attId[i].s === 0) {
585 				zeroSizedAttachments = true;
586 				continue;
587 			}
588 			msg.addAttachmentId(attId[i].aid);
589 		}
590 	} else if (attId) {
591 		msg.addAttachmentId(attId);
592 	}
593 
594 	if (zeroSizedAttachments) {
595 		appCtxt.setStatusMsg(ZmMsg.zeroSizedAtts);
596 	}
597 
598 	// check if this is a resend
599 	if (this.sendUID && this.backupForm) {
600 		// if so, check if user changed anything since canceling the send
601 		if (isDraft || this._backupForm() !== this.backupForm) {
602 			this.sendUID = (new Date()).getTime();
603 		}
604 	} else {
605 		this.sendUID = (new Date()).getTime();
606 	}
607 
608 	// get list of message part id's for any forwarded attachments
609 	var forwardAttIds = this._getForwardAttIds(ZmComposeView.FORWARD_ATT_NAME + this._sessionId, !isDraft && this._hideOriginalAttachments);
610 	var forwardMsgIds = [];
611 	if (this._msgIds) {
612 		// Get any message ids added via the attachment dialog (See
613 		// _attsDoneCallback which adds new forwarded attachments to msgIds)
614 		forwardMsgIds = this._msgIds;
615 		this._msgIds = null;
616 	} else if (this._msgAttId) {
617 		// Forward one message or Reply as attachment
618 		forwardMsgIds.push(this._msgAttId);
619 	}
620 
621 	// --------------------------------------------
622 	// Passed validation checks, message ok to send
623 	// --------------------------------------------
624 
625 	// build MIME
626 	var top = this._getTopPart(msg, isDraft);
627 
628 	msg.setTopPart(top);
629 	msg.setSubject(subject);
630 	msg.setForwardAttIds(forwardAttIds);
631 	msg.setForwardAttObjs(this._getForwardAttObjs(forwardAttIds));
632 	if (!contactId) {
633 		//contactId not passed in, but vcard signature may be set
634 		if (this._msg && this._msg._contactAttIds) {
635 			contactId = this._msg._contactAttIds;
636 			this._msg.setContactAttIds([]);
637 		}
638 	}
639 	msg.setContactAttIds(contactId);
640 	for (var i = 0; i < ZmMailMsg.COMPOSE_ADDRS.length; i++) {
641 		var type = ZmMailMsg.COMPOSE_ADDRS[i];
642 		if (addrs[type] && addrs[type].all.size() > 0) {
643 			msg.setAddresses(type, addrs[type].all);
644 		}
645 	}
646 	msg.identity = this.getIdentity();
647 	msg.sendUID = this.sendUID;
648 
649 	if (!msg.identity) {
650 		msg.delegatedSenderAddr = this.identitySelect.getValue();
651 		var option = this.identitySelect.getSelectedOption();
652 		msg.delegatedSenderAddrIsDL = option.getExtraData("isDL");
653 		msg.isOnBehalfOf = option.getExtraData("isObo");
654 	}
655 	// save a reference to the original message
656 	msg._origMsg = this._msg;
657 	if (this._msg && this._msg._instanceDate) {
658 		msg._instanceDate = this._msg._instanceDate;
659 	}
660 
661 	this._setMessageFlags(msg);
662 
663 	if (this._action === ZmOperation.DRAFT && this._origAcctMsgId) {
664 		msg.origAcctMsgId = this._origAcctMsgId;
665 	}
666 
667 	// replied/forw msg or draft shouldn't have att ID (a repl/forw voicemail mail msg may)
668 	if (this._msg && this._msg.attId) {
669 		msg.addAttachmentId(this._msg.attId);
670 	}
671 
672 	if (this._msgAttId) {
673 		if (forwardMsgIds.length > 0) {
674 			// Check if the MsgId is already present in the fwdMsgIds list.
675 			var i = 0;
676 			while (forwardMsgIds[i] && forwardMsgIds[i] !== this._msgAttId) {
677 				i++;
678 			}
679 			if (forwardMsgIds.length === i) {
680 				forwardMsgIds.push(this._msgAttId);
681 			}
682 			delete i;
683 		} else {
684 			forwardMsgIds.push(this._msgAttId);
685 		}
686 	}
687 
688 	msg.setMessageAttachmentId(forwardMsgIds);
689 
690 	var priority = this._controller._getPriority();
691 	if (priority) {
692 		msg.flagLocal(priority, true);
693 	}
694 
695 	if (this._fromSelect) {
696 		msg.fromSelectValue = this._fromSelect.getSelectedOption();
697 	}
698 
699 	if (!this._zimletCheck(msg, isDraft, forceBail)) {
700 		return;
701 	}
702 		
703 	return msg;
704 };
705 
706 ZmComposeView.prototype._getTopPart =
707 function(msg, isDraft, bodyContent) {
708 		
709 	// set up message parts as necessary
710 	var top = new ZmMimePart();
711 	var textContent;
712 	var content = bodyContent || this._getEditorContent();
713 
714 	if (this._composeMode == Dwt.HTML) {
715 		top.setContentType(ZmMimeTable.MULTI_ALT);
716 		
717 		// experimental code for generating text part
718 		if (false && this._htmlEditor) {
719 			var userText = AjxStringUtil.convertHtml2Text(this.getUserText());
720 			this.setComponent(ZmComposeView.BC_TEXT_PRE, userText)
721 			this._setReturns(Dwt.TEXT);
722 			var xxx = this._layoutBodyComponents(this._compList, Dwt.TEXT);
723 //			this.resetBody({ extraBodyText:userText }, true);
724 //			this._composeMode = Dwt.HTML;
725 			this._setReturns(Dwt.HTML);
726 		}
727 
728 		// create two more mp's for text and html content types
729 		var textPart = new ZmMimePart();
730 		textPart.setContentType(ZmMimeTable.TEXT_PLAIN);
731 		textContent = this._htmlToText(content);
732 		textPart.setContent(textContent);
733 		top.children.add(textPart);
734 
735 		var htmlPart = new ZmMimePart();
736 		htmlPart.setContentType(ZmMimeTable.TEXT_HTML);		
737 
738 		if (this._htmlEditor) {
739 			var idoc = this._htmlEditor._getIframeDoc();
740 			this._cleanupFileRefImages(idoc);
741 			this._restoreMultipartRelatedImages(idoc);
742 			if (!isDraft) {
743 				this._cleanupSignatureIds(idoc);
744 			}
745 			htmlPart.setContent(this._fixStyles(this._getEditorContent(!isDraft)));
746 		}
747 		else {
748 			htmlPart.setContent(bodyContent);
749 		}
750 
751 		var content = "<html><body>" + AjxStringUtil.defangHtmlContent(htmlPart.getContent()) + "</body></html>";
752 
753 		htmlPart.setContent(content);
754 
755 		if (this._htmlEditor) {
756 			this._handleInlineAtts(msg, true);
757 		}
758 		var inlineAtts = msg.getInlineAttachments();
759 		var inlineDocAtts = msg.getInlineDocAttachments();
760 		var iAtts = [].concat(inlineAtts, inlineDocAtts);
761 		if (iAtts &&  iAtts.length > 0) {
762 			var relatedPart = new ZmMimePart();
763 			relatedPart.setContentType(ZmMimeTable.MULTI_RELATED);
764 			relatedPart.children.add(htmlPart);
765 			top.children.add(relatedPart);
766 		} else {
767 			top.children.add(htmlPart);
768 		}
769 	}
770 	else {
771 		var inline = this._isInline();
772 
773 		var textPart = (this._extraParts || inline) ? new ZmMimePart() : top;
774 		textPart.setContentType(ZmMimeTable.TEXT_PLAIN);
775 		textContent = content;
776 		textPart.setContent(textContent);
777 
778 		if (inline) {
779 			top.setContentType(ZmMimeTable.MULTI_ALT);
780 			var relatedPart = new ZmMimePart();
781 			relatedPart.setContentType(ZmMimeTable.MULTI_RELATED);
782 			relatedPart.children.add(textPart);
783 			top.children.add(relatedPart);
784 		} else {
785 			if (this._extraParts) {
786 				top.setContentType(ZmMimeTable.MULTI_ALT);
787 				top.children.add(textPart);
788 			}
789 		}
790 	}
791 
792 	// add extra message parts
793 	if (this._extraParts) {
794 		for (var i = 0; i < this._extraParts.length; i++) {
795 			var mimePart = this._extraParts[i];
796 			top.children.add(mimePart);
797 		}
798 	}
799 
800 	// store text-content of the current email for zimlets to work with
801 	// TODO: zimlets are being lazy here, and text content could be large; zimlets should get content from parts
802 	msg.textBodyContent = !this._htmlEditor ? textContent : (this._composeMode === Dwt.HTML)
803 		? this._htmlEditor.getTextVersion()
804 		: this._getEditorContent();
805 		
806 	return top;
807 };
808 
809 // Returns the editor content with any markers stripped (unless told not to strip them)
810 ZmComposeView.prototype._getEditorContent =
811 function(leaveMarkers) {
812 	var content = "";
813 	if (this._htmlEditor) {
814 		content = this._htmlEditor.getContent(true);
815 		if (!leaveMarkers && (this._composeMode === Dwt.TEXT)) {
816 			content = this._removeMarkers(content);
817 		}
818 	}
819 	return content;
820 };
821 
822 // Bug 27422 - Firefox and Safari implementation of execCommand("bold")
823 // etc use styles, and some email clients (Entourage) don't process the
824 // styles and the text remains plain. So we post-process and convert
825 // those to the tags (which are what the IE version of execCommand() does).
826 ZmComposeView.prototype._fixStyles =
827 function(text) {
828 	if (AjxEnv.isFirefox) {
829 		text = text.replace(/<span style="font-weight: bold;">(.+?)<\/span>/, "<strong>$1</strong>");
830 		text = text.replace(/<span style="font-style: italic;">(.+?)<\/span>/, "<em>$1</em>");
831 		text = text.replace(/<span style="text-decoration: underline;">(.+?)<\/span>/, "<u>$1</u>");
832 		text = text.replace(/<span style="text-decoration: line-through;">(.+?)<\/span>/, "<strike>$1</strike>");
833 	} else if (AjxEnv.isSafari) {
834 		text = text.replace(/<span class="Apple-style-span" style="font-weight: bold;">(.+?)<\/span>/, "<strong>$1</strong>");
835 		text = text.replace(/<span class="Apple-style-span" style="font-style: italic;">(.+?)<\/span>/, "<em>$1</em>");
836 		text = text.replace(/<span class="Apple-style-span" style="text-decoration: underline;">(.+?)<\/span>/, "<u>$1</u>");
837 		text = text.replace(/<span class="Apple-style-span" style="text-decoration: line-through;">(.+?)<\/span>/, "<strike>$1</strike>");
838 	}
839 	return text;
840 };
841 
842 ZmComposeView.prototype._setMessageFlags =
843 function(msg) {
844 		
845 	if (this._msg) {
846 		var isInviteReply = ZmComposeController.IS_INVITE_REPLY[this._action];
847 		if (this._action === ZmOperation.DRAFT || this._msg.isDraft) {
848 			msg.isReplied = (this._msg.rt === "r");
849 			msg.isForwarded = (this._msg.rt === "w");
850 			msg.isDraft = this._msg.isDraft;
851 			// check if we're resaving a draft that was originally a reply/forward
852 			if (msg.isDraft) {
853 				// if so, set both origId and the draft id
854 				msg.origId = (msg.isReplied || msg.isForwarded) ? this._msg.origId : null;
855 				msg.id = this._msg.id;
856 				msg.nId = this._msg.nId;
857 			}
858 		} else {
859 			msg.isReplied = ZmComposeController.IS_REPLY[this._action];
860 			msg.isForwarded = ZmComposeController.IS_FORWARD[this._action];
861 			msg.origId = this._msg.id;
862 		}
863         msg.isOfflineCreated = this._msg.isOfflineCreated;
864 		msg.isInviteReply = isInviteReply;
865 		msg.acceptFolderId = this._acceptFolderId;
866 		var notifyActionMap = ZmComposeView.NOTIFY_ACTION_MAP || {};
867 		var inviteMode = notifyActionMap[this._action] ? notifyActionMap[this._action] : this._action;
868 		msg.inviteMode = isInviteReply ? inviteMode : null;
869         if (this._action !== ZmOperation.NEW_MESSAGE && (!msg.isDraft  || msg.isReplied)){  //Bug: 82942 - in-reply-to shouldn't be added to new messages.
870             msg.irtMessageId = this._msg.messageId;
871         }
872         msg.folderId = this._msg.folderId;
873     }
874 };
875 
876 ZmComposeView.prototype._zimletCheck =
877 function(msg, isDraft, forceBail) {
878 		
879 	/*
880 	* finally, check for any errors via zimlets..
881 	* A Zimlet can listen to emailErrorCheck action to perform further check and
882 	* alert user about the error just before sending email. We will be showing
883 	* yes/no dialog. This zimlet must return an object {hasError:<true or false>,
884 	* errorMsg:<Some Error msg>, zimletName:<zimletName>} e.g: {hasError:true,
885 	* errorMsg:"you might have forgotten attaching an attachment, do you want to
886 	* continue?", zimletName:"com_zimbra_attachmentAlert"}
887 	**/
888 	if ((!isDraft || forceBail) && appCtxt.areZimletsLoaded()) {
889 		var boolAndErrorMsgArray = [];
890 		var showErrorDlg = false;
891 		var errorMsg = "";
892 		var zimletName = "";
893 		appCtxt.notifyZimlets("emailErrorCheck", [msg, boolAndErrorMsgArray]);
894 		var blen =  boolAndErrorMsgArray.length;
895 		for (var k = 0; k < blen; k++) {
896 			var obj = boolAndErrorMsgArray[k];
897 			if (obj === null || obj === undefined) { continue; }
898 
899 			var hasError = obj.hasError;
900 			zimletName = obj.zimletName;
901 			if (Boolean(hasError)) {
902 				if (this._ignoredZimlets) {
903 					if (this._ignoredZimlets[zimletName]) { // if we should ignore this zimlet
904 						delete this._ignoredZimlets[zimletName];
905 						continue; // skip
906 					}
907 				}
908 				showErrorDlg = true;
909 				errorMsg = obj.errorMsg;
910 				break;
911 			}
912 		}
913 		if (showErrorDlg) {
914 			this.enableInputs(false);
915 			var cd = appCtxt.getOkCancelMsgDialog();
916 			cd.setMessage(errorMsg, DwtMessageDialog.WARNING_STYLE);
917 			var params = {errDialog:cd, zimletName:zimletName};
918 			cd.registerCallback(DwtDialog.OK_BUTTON, this._errViaZimletOkCallback, this, params);
919 			cd.registerCallback(DwtDialog.CANCEL_BUTTON, this._errViaZimletCancelCallback, this, params);
920 			cd.popup();
921 			return false;
922 		}
923 	}
924 
925 	return true;
926 };
927 
928 ZmComposeView.prototype.setDocAttachments =
929 function(msg, docIds) {
930 
931 	if (!docIds) { return; }
932 
933 	var zeroSizedAttachments = false;
934 	var inline = this._isInline();
935 	for (var i = 0; i < docIds.length; i++) {
936 		var docAtt = docIds[i];
937 		var contentType = docAtt.ct;
938 		if (docAtt.s === 0) {
939 			zeroSizedAttachments = true;
940 			continue;
941 		}
942 		if (this._attachDialog && inline) {
943 			if (contentType && contentType.indexOf("image") !== -1) {
944 				var cid = this._generateCid();
945 				this._htmlEditor.insertImage("cid:" + cid, AjxEnv.isIE);
946 				msg.addInlineDocAttachment(cid, docAtt.id);
947 			} else {
948 				msg.addDocumentAttachment(docAtt);
949 			}
950 		} else {
951 			msg.addDocumentAttachment(docAtt);
952 		}
953 	}
954 	if (zeroSizedAttachments){
955 		appCtxt.setStatusMsg(ZmMsg.zeroSizedAtts);
956 	}
957 };
958 
959 // Sets the mode the editor should be in.
960 ZmComposeView.prototype.setComposeMode =
961 function(composeMode, initOnly) {
962 
963 	if (composeMode === this._composeMode) { return; }
964 		
965 	var htmlMode = (composeMode === Dwt.HTML);
966 	if (htmlMode && !appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.HTML_COMPOSE_ENABLED)) { return; }
967 		
968 	var previousMode = this._composeMode;
969 	var modeSwitch = (!initOnly && previousMode && composeMode && previousMode !== composeMode);
970 	var userText = modeSwitch && this.getUserText();
971 	var quotedText = modeSwitch && this._getQuotedText();
972 	this._composeMode = composeMode;
973 	this._setReturns();
974 	var curMember = htmlMode ? this._htmlEditor : this._bodyField;
975 		
976 	// switch the editor's mode
977 	this._htmlEditor.setContent("");
978 	this._htmlEditor.setMode(composeMode);
979 		
980 	if (modeSwitch) {
981 		userText = htmlMode ? AjxStringUtil.convertToHtml(userText) : AjxStringUtil.trim(this._htmlToText(userText)) + this._crlf;
982 		var op = htmlMode ? ZmOperation.FORMAT_HTML : ZmOperation.FORMAT_TEXT;
983 		this.resetBody({ extraBodyText:userText, quotedText:quotedText, op:op, keepAttachments:true });
984 	}
985 
986 	// reset the body field Id and object ref
987 	this._bodyFieldId = this._htmlEditor.getBodyFieldId();
988 	this._bodyField = Dwt.byId(this._bodyFieldId);
989 	if (this._bodyField.disabled) {
990 		this._bodyField.disabled = false;
991 	}
992 
993 	this._resetBodySize();
994 
995 	// recalculate form value since HTML mode inserts HTML tags
996 	this._setFormValue();
997 
998 	// update the tabbing group
999 	var newMember = (composeMode === Dwt.TEXT) ? this._bodyField : this._htmlEditor;
1000 	if (curMember && newMember && (curMember !== newMember) && this._controller._tabGroup) {
1001 		this._controller._tabGroup.replaceMember(curMember, newMember);
1002 		// focus via replaceMember() doesn't take, try again
1003 		if (composeMode === Dwt.HTML) {
1004 			this._retryHtmlEditorFocus();
1005 		}
1006 	}
1007 	if (!htmlMode) {
1008 		this._moveCaretOnTimer();
1009 	}
1010 
1011 	if (this._msg && this._isInline(this._msg) && composeMode === Dwt.TEXT) {
1012 		this._showForwardField(this._msg, this._action, null, true);
1013 	}
1014 };
1015 
1016 ZmComposeView.prototype._retryHtmlEditorFocus =
1017 function() {
1018 	if (this._htmlEditor.hasFocus()) {
1019 		setTimeout(this._focusHtmlEditor, 10);
1020 	}
1021 };

1023 /**
1024  * Handles compose in new window.
1025  * 
1026  * @param params
1027  */
1028 ZmComposeView.prototype.setDetach =
1029 function(params) {
1030 
1031 	this._action = params.action;
1032 	this._msg = params.msg;
1033 
1034 	// set the addr fields as populated
1035 	for (var type in params.addrs) {
1036 		this._recipients.setAddress(type, "");
1037 		var addrs = AjxUtil.toArray(params.addrs[type]);
1038 		this._recipients.addAddresses(type, AjxVector.fromArray(addrs));
1039 	}
1040 
1041 	this._subjectField.value = params.subj || "";
1042 	this._controller._setPriority(params.priority);
1043 	this.updateTabTitle();
1044 
1045 	var content = params.body || "";
1046 	if ((content == "") && (this.getComposeMode() == Dwt.HTML)) {
1047 		content	= "<br>";
1048 	}
1049 	this._htmlEditor.setContent(content);
1050 
1051 	if (params.forwardHtml) {
1052 		this._attcDiv.innerHTML = params.forwardHtml;
1053 		this._msgAttId = params.msgAttId;
1054 	}
1055 	if (params.identityId && this.identitySelect) {
1056 		var opt = this.identitySelect.getOptionAtIndex(params.identityId);
1057 		this.identitySelect.setSelectedOption(opt);
1058 		this._controller.resetIdentity(params.identity.id);
1059 	}
1060 
1061 	this.backupForm = params.backupForm;
1062 	this.sendUID = params.sendUID;
1063 
1064 	// bug 14322 -- in Windows Firefox, DEL/BACKSPACE don't work
1065 	// when composing in new window until we (1) enter some text
1066 	// or (2) resize the window (!).  I chose the latter.
1067 	if (AjxEnv.isGeckoBased && AjxEnv.isWindows) {
1068 		window.resizeBy(1, 1);
1069 	}
1070 };
1071 
1072 ZmComposeView.prototype.reEnableDesignMode =
1073 function() {
1074 	if (this._composeMode === Dwt.HTML) {
1075 		this._htmlEditor.reEnableDesignMode();
1076 	}
1077 };
1078 
1079 // user just saved draft, update compose view as necessary
1080 ZmComposeView.prototype.processMsgDraft =
1081 function(msgDraft) {
1082 
1083 	if (this._isInline(msgDraft)) {
1084 		this._handleInline(msgDraft);
1085 	}
1086 	this.reEnableDesignMode();
1087     this._msg = msgDraft;
1088 	this._msgAttId = null;
1089 	// always redo att links since user couldve removed att before saving draft
1090 	this.cleanupAttachments(true);
1091 	this._showForwardField(msgDraft, ZmOperation.DRAFT);
1092 	this._resetBodySize();
1093 	// save form state (to check for change later)
1094 	this._setFormValue();
1095 };
1096 
1097 ZmComposeView.prototype._handleInline =
1098 function(msgObj) {
1099 	return this._fixMultipartRelatedImages(msgObj || this._msg, this._htmlEditor._getIframeDoc());
1100 };
1101 
1102 ZmComposeView.prototype._fixMultipartRelatedImages_onTimer =
1103 function(msg, account) {
1104 	// The first time the editor is initialized, idoc.getElementsByTagName("img") is empty.
1105 	// Use a callback to fix images after editor is initialized.
1106 	var idoc = this._htmlEditor._getIframeDoc();
1107 	if (!this._firstTimeFixImages) {
1108 		this._htmlEditor.addOnContentInitializedListener(this._fixMultipartRelatedImages.bind(this, msg, idoc, account));
1109 	} else {
1110 		this._fixMultipartRelatedImages(msg, idoc, account);
1111 	}
1112 };
1113 
1114 /**
1115  * Twiddle the img tags so that the HTML editor can display the images. Instead of
1116  * a cid (which is relevant only within the MIME msg), point to the img with a URL.
1117  * 
1118  * @private
1119  */
1120 ZmComposeView.prototype._fixMultipartRelatedImages =
1121 function(msg, idoc, account) {
1122 
1123 	if (!this._firstTimeFixImages) {
1124 		this._htmlEditor.clearOnContentInitializedListeners();
1125 		var self = this; // Fix possible hiccups during compose in new window
1126 		setTimeout(function() {
1127 				self._fixMultipartRelatedImages(msg, self._htmlEditor._getIframeDoc(), account);
1128 		}, 10);
1129 		this._firstTimeFixImages = true;
1130 		return;
1131 	}
1132 
1133 	idoc = idoc || this._htmlEditor._getIframeDoc();
1134 	if (!idoc) { return; }
1135 
1136 	var showImages = false;
1137 	if (msg) {
1138 		var addr = msg.getAddress(AjxEmailAddress.FROM) || ZmMsg.unknown;
1139 		var sender = msg.getAddress(AjxEmailAddress.SENDER); // bug fix #10652 - check invite if sentBy is set (means on-behalf-of)
1140 		var sentBy = (sender && sender.address) ? sender : addr;
1141 		var sentByAddr = sentBy && sentBy !== ZmMsg.unknown ? sentBy.getAddress() : null;
1142 		if (sentByAddr) {
1143 			msg.sentByAddr = sentByAddr;
1144 			msg.sentByDomain = sentByAddr.substr(sentByAddr.indexOf("@")+1);
1145 			showImages = this._isTrustedSender(msg);
1146 		}
1147 	}
1148 
1149 	var images = idoc.getElementsByTagName("img");
1150 	var num = 0;
1151 	for (var i = 0; i < images.length; i++) {
1152 		var dfsrc = images[i].getAttribute("dfsrc") || images[i].getAttribute("data-mce-src") || images[i].src;
1153 		if (dfsrc) {
1154 			if (dfsrc.substring(0,4) === "cid:") {
1155 				num++;
1156 				var cid = "<" + dfsrc.substring(4).replace("%40","@") + ">";
1157 				var src = msg && msg.getContentPartAttachUrl(ZmMailMsg.CONTENT_PART_ID, cid);
1158 				if (src) {
1159 					//Cache cleared, becoz part id's may change.
1160 					src = src + "&t=" + (new Date()).getTime();
1161 					images[i].src = src;
1162 					images[i].setAttribute("dfsrc", dfsrc);
1163 				}
1164 			} else if (dfsrc.substring(0,4) === "doc:") {
1165                 var src = [appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.REST_URL, null, account), ZmFolder.SEP, dfsrc.substring(4)].join('');
1166 				images[i].src = AjxStringUtil.fixCrossDomainReference(src, false, true);;
1167 			} else if (dfsrc.indexOf("//") === -1) { // check for content-location verison
1168 				var src = msg && msg.getContentPartAttachUrl(ZmMailMsg.CONTENT_PART_LOCATION, dfsrc);
1169 				if (src) {
1170 					//Cache cleared, becoz part id's may change.
1171 					src = src + "&t=" + (new Date()).getTime();
1172 					num++;
1173 					images[i].src = src;
1174 					images[i].setAttribute("dfsrc", dfsrc);
1175 				}
1176 			}
1177 			else if (showImages) {
1178 				var src = dfsrc;//x + "&t=" + (new Date()).getTime();
1179 				num++;
1180 				images[i].src = src;
1181 				images[i].setAttribute("dfsrc", dfsrc);
1182 			}
1183 		}
1184 	}
1185 	return num === images.length;
1186 };

1188 ZmComposeView.prototype._isTrustedSender =
1189 function(msg) {
1190 	var trustedList = this.getTrustedSendersList();
1191 	return trustedList.contains(msg.sentByAddr.toLowerCase()) || trustedList.contains(msg.sentByDomain.toLowerCase());
1192 };

1199 ZmComposeView.prototype._cleanupFileRefImages =
1200 function(idoc) {
1201 
1202 	function removeImg(img){
1203 		var parent = img.parentNode;
1204 		parent.removeChild(img);
1205 	}
1206 
1207 	if (idoc) {
1208 		var images = idoc.getElementsByTagName("img");
1209 		var len = images.length, fileImgs=[], img, src;
1210 		for (var i = 0; i < images.length; i++) {
1211 			img = images[i];
1212 			try {
1213 				src = img.src;
1214 			} catch(e) {
1215 				//IE8 throws invalid pointer exception for src attribute when src is a data uri
1216 			}
1217 			if (img && src && src.indexOf('file://') == 0) {
1218 				removeImg(img);
1219 				i--; //removeImg reduces the images.length by 1.
1220 			}
1221 		}
1222 	}
1223 };

1225 /**
1226  * Change the src tags on inline img's to point to cid's, which is what we
1227  * want for an outbound MIME msg.
1228  */
1229 ZmComposeView.prototype._restoreMultipartRelatedImages =
1230 function(idoc) {
1231 
1232 	if (idoc) {
1233 		var images = idoc.getElementsByTagName("img");
1234 		var num = 0;
1235 		for (var i = 0; i < images.length; i++) {
1236 			var img = images[i];
1237 			var cid = "";
1238 			var src = img.src && unescape(img.src);
1239 			var dfsrc = img.getAttribute("dfsrc") || img.getAttribute("data-mce-src");
1240 			if (dfsrc && dfsrc.indexOf("cid:") === 0) {
1241 				cid = dfsrc;
1242 				img.removeAttribute("dfsrc");
1243 			} else if (img.src && img.src.indexOf("cid:") === 0) {
1244 				cid = img.src;
1245 			} else if ( dfsrc && dfsrc.substring(0,4) === "doc:"){
1246 				cid = "cid:" + this._generateCid();
1247 				img.removeAttribute("dfsrc");
1248 				img.setAttribute("doc", dfsrc.substring(4, dfsrc.length));
1249 			} else if (src && src.indexOf(appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.CSFE_MSG_FETCHER_URI)) === 0) {
1250 				// bug 85129 - handle images copied from another mail
1251 				var qsparams = AjxStringUtil.parseQueryString(src);
1252 
1253 				if (qsparams.id && qsparams.part) {
1254 					cid = "cid:" + this._generateCid();
1255 					img.setAttribute('data-zimbra-id', qsparams.id);
1256 					img.setAttribute('data-zimbra-part', qsparams.part);
1257 				}
1258 			} else {
1259 				// If "Display External Images" is false then handle Reply/Forward
1260 				if (dfsrc && (!this._msg || this._msg.showImages))
1261 					//IE: Over HTTPS, http src urls for images might cause an issue.
1262 					try {
1263 						img.src = dfsrc;
1264 					} catch(ex) {};
1265 				}
1266 			if (cid) {
1267 				img.setAttribute("dfsrc", cid);
1268 			}
1269 		}
1270 	}
1271 };

1281 /**
1282  * Display an attachment dialog - either a direct and native upload dialog or
1283  * the legacy dialog.
1284  *
1285  * @param {constant}  type      One of the <code>ZmComposeView.UPLOAD_</code> constants.
1286  */
1287 ZmComposeView.prototype.showAttachmentDialog =
1288 function(type) {
1289 
1290 	if (this._disableAttachments) { return };
1291 
1292 	// collapse the attachment menu, just in case
1293 	this.collapseAttMenu();
1294 
1295 	if (AjxEnv.supportsHTML5File &&
1296 	    type !== ZmComposeView.UPLOAD_BRIEFCASE) {
1297 		var isinline = (type === ZmComposeView.UPLOAD_INLINE);
1298 
1299 		inputelem = document.createElement('INPUT');
1300 		inputelem.type = 'file';
1301 		inputelem.title = ZmMsg.uploadNewFile;
1302 		inputelem.multiple = true;
1303 		inputelem.style.display = 'none';
1304 
1305 		inputelem.onchange =
1306 			this._submitMyComputerAttachments.bind(this, null, inputelem,
1307 			                                       isinline);
1308 
1309 		// IE won't react to unparented INPUTs
1310 		var fragment = document.createDocumentFragment();
1311 		fragment.appendChild(inputelem);
1312 
1313 		inputelem.click();
1314 
1315 		return;
1316 	}
1317 
1318 	var attachDialog = this._attachDialog = appCtxt.getAttachDialog();
1319 
1320 	if (type === ZmComposeView.UPLOAD_BRIEFCASE) {
1321 		attachDialog.getBriefcaseView();
1322 	} else {
1323 		attachDialog.getMyComputerView();
1324 	}
1325 
1326 	var callback = this._attsDoneCallback.bind(this, true);
1327 	attachDialog.setUploadCallback(callback);
1328 	attachDialog.popup();
1329 	attachDialog.enableInlineOption(this._composeMode === Dwt.HTML);
1330 
1331 	if (type === ZmComposeView.UPLOAD_INLINE)
1332 		attachDialog.setInline(true);
1333 
1334 };

1336 /**
1337  * Revert compose view to a clean state (usually called before popping compose view).
1338  * 
1339  * @param	{Boolean}	bEnableInputs		if <code>true</code>, enable the input fields
1340  */
1341 ZmComposeView.prototype.reset =
1342 function(bEnableInputs) {
1343 
1344 	this.backupForm = null;
1345 	this.sendUID = null;
1346 
1347 	// reset autocomplete list
1348 	if (this._acAddrSelectList) {
1349 		this._acAddrSelectList.reset();
1350 		this._acAddrSelectList.show(false);
1351 	}
1352 
1353 	this._recipients.reset();
1354 
1355 	// reset subject / body fields
1356 	this._subjectField.value = this._subject = "";
1357 	this.updateTabTitle();
1358 
1359 	this._htmlEditor.resetSpellCheck();
1360 	this._htmlEditor.clear();
1361 
1362 	// this._htmlEditor.clear() resets html editor body field.
1363 	// Setting this._bodyField to its latest value
1364 	this._bodyField = this._htmlEditor.getBodyField();
1365 	this._bodyContent = {};
1366 
1367 	// the div that holds the attc.table and null out innerHTML
1368 	this.cleanupAttachments(true);
1369 
1370 	this._resetBodySize();
1371 	this._controller._curIncOptions = null;
1372 	this._msgAttId = null;
1373 	this._clearFormValue();
1374 	this._components = {};
1375 		
1376 	// reset dirty shields
1377 	this._noSubjectOkay = this._badAddrsOkay = this._spellCheckOkay = false;
1378 
1379 	Dwt.setVisible(this._oboRow, false);
1380 
1381 	// Resetting Add attachments from original link option
1382 	Dwt.setVisible(ZmId.getViewId(this._view, ZmId.CMP_REPLY_ATT_ROW), false);
1383 
1384 	// remove extra mime parts
1385 	this._extraParts = null;
1386 
1387 	// enable/disable input fields
1388 	this.enableInputs(bEnableInputs);
1389 
1390 	// reset state of the spell check button
1391 	this._controller.toggleSpellCheckButton(false);
1392 
1393 	//reset state of previous Signature cache variable.
1394 	this._previousSignature = null;
1395 	this._previousSignatureMode = null;
1396 
1397 	// used by drafts handling in multi-account
1398 	this._origAcctMsgId = null;
1399 };

1407 /**
1408  * Adds an extra MIME part to the message. The extra parts will be
1409  * added, in order, to the end of the parts after the primary message
1410  * part.
1411  * 
1412  * @private
1413  */
1414 ZmComposeView.prototype.addMimePart =
1415 function(mimePart) {
1416 	if (!this._extraParts) {
1417 		this._extraParts = [];
1418 	}
1419 	this._extraParts.push(mimePart);
1420 };

1422 // Returns the full content for the signature, including surrounding tags if in HTML mode.
1423 ZmComposeView.prototype._getSignatureContentSpan =
1424 function(params) {
1425 
1426 	var signature = params.signature || this.getSignatureById(this._controller.getSelectedSignature(), params.account);
1427 	if (!signature) { return ""; }
1428 
1429 	var signatureId = signature.id;
1430 	var mode = params.mode || this._composeMode;
1431 	var sigContent = params.sigContent || this.getSignatureContent(signatureId, mode);
1432 	if (mode === Dwt.HTML) {
1433 		var markerHtml = "";
1434 		if (params.style === ZmSetting.SIG_OUTLOOK) {
1435 			markerHtml = " " + ZmComposeView.BC_HTML_MARKER_ATTR + "='" + params.marker + "'";
1436 		}
1437 		sigContent = ["<div id=\"", signatureId, "\"", markerHtml, ">", sigContent, "</div>"].join('');
1438 	}
1439 
1440 	return this._getSignatureSeparator(params) + sigContent;
1441 };
1442 
1443 ZmComposeView.prototype._attachSignatureVcard =
1444 function(signatureId) {
1445 
1446 	var signature = this.getSignatureById(signatureId);
1447 	if (signature && signature.contactId) {
1448 		if (!this._msg) {
1449 			this._msg = new ZmMailMsg();
1450 		}
1451 		if (this._msg._contactAttIds) {
1452 			this._msg._contactAttIds.push(signature.contactId);
1453 		} else {
1454 			this._msg.setContactAttIds(signature.contactId);
1455 		}
1456 
1457 		//come back later and see if we need to save the draft
1458 		AjxTimedAction.scheduleAction(this._checkSaveDraft.bind(this), 500);
1459 	}
1460 };
1461 
1462 ZmComposeView.prototype._updateSignatureVcard =
1463 function(oldSignatureId, newSignatureId) {
1464 
1465 	if (oldSignatureId) {
1466 		var hadVcard = false;
1467 		// uncheck box for previous vcard att so it gets removed
1468 		var oldSig = this.getSignatureById(oldSignatureId);
1469 		if (oldSig && oldSig.contactId) {
1470 			var vcardPart;
1471 			var atts = this._msg && this._msg.attachments;
1472 			if (atts && atts.length) {
1473 				//we need to figure out what input to uncheck
1474 				var sigContact;
1475 				var item = appCtxt.cacheGet(oldSig.contactId);
1476 				if (item && item.isZmContact) {
1477 					sigContact = item;
1478 				}
1479 				for (var i = 0; i < atts.length && !vcardPart; i++) {
1480 					if (atts[i].contentType === ZmMimeTable.TEXT_VCARD
1481 					|| atts[i].contentType === ZmMimeTable.TEXT_DIRECTORY) {
1482 						//we may have multiple vcards, determine which one to remove based on signature in cache
1483 						if (sigContact) {
1484 							//remove the file extension from fileName
1485 							var name = atts[i].fileName.substring(0, atts[i].fileName.length - 4);
1486 							if (name === sigContact._fileAs) {
1487 								vcardPart = atts[i].part;
1488 							}
1489 						}
1490 						else {
1491 							vcardPart = atts[i].part;
1492 						}
1493 						atts.splice(i, 1);
1494 					}
1495 				}
1496 			}
1497 			var inputs = document.getElementsByName(ZmComposeView.FORWARD_ATT_NAME + this._sessionId);
1498 			if (inputs && inputs.length) {
1499 				for (var i = 0; i < inputs.length; i++) {
1500 					if (inputs[i].value === vcardPart) {
1501 						var span = inputs[i].parentNode && inputs[i].parentNode.parentNode;
1502 						if (span && span.id) {
1503 							this._removeAttachedMessage(span.id, vcardPart);
1504 							hadVcard = true;
1505 						}
1506 					}
1507 				}
1508 			}
1509 		}
1510 		if (hadVcard && !newSignatureId) {
1511 			this._controller.saveDraft(ZmComposeController.DRAFT_TYPE_MANUAL);
1512 		}
1513 	}
1514 };
1515 
1516 ZmComposeView.prototype._checkSaveDraft =
1517 function() {
1518 	if (this._msg && this._msg._contactAttIds && this._msg._contactAttIds.length > 0) {
1519 		this._controller.saveDraft(ZmComposeController.DRAFT_TYPE_MANUAL, null, null, null, this._msg._contactAttIds);
1520 	}
1521 };

1523 /*
1524  * Convertor for text nodes that, unlike the one in AjxStringUtil._traverse, doesn't append spaces to the results
1525 */
1526 ZmComposeView._convertTextNode =
1527 function(el, ctxt) {
1528 
1529 	if (el.nodeValue.search(AjxStringUtil._NON_WHITESPACE) !== -1) {
1530 		if (ctxt.lastNode === "ol" || ctxt.lastNode === "ul") {
1531 			return "\n";
1532 		}
1533 		if (ctxt.isPreformatted) {
1534 			return AjxStringUtil.trim(el.nodeValue);
1535 		} else {
1536 			return AjxStringUtil.trim(el.nodeValue.replace(AjxStringUtil._LF, ""));
1537 		}
1538 	}
1539 	return "";
1540 };

1542 ZmComposeView.prototype.dispose =
1543 function() {
1544 	if (this._identityChangeListenerObj) {
1545 		var collection = appCtxt.getIdentityCollection();
1546 		collection.removeChangeListener(this._identityChangeListenerObj);
1547 	}
1548 	DwtComposite.prototype.dispose.call(this);
1549 };

1551 ZmComposeView.prototype.getSignatureById =
1552 function(signatureId, account) {
1553 	signatureId = signatureId || this._controller.getSelectedSignature();
1554 	return appCtxt.getSignatureCollection(account).getById(signatureId);
1555 };
1556 
1557 ZmComposeView.prototype.getSignatureContent =
1558 function(signatureId, mode) {
1559 
1560 	var extraSignature = this._getExtraSignature();
1561 	signatureId = signatureId || this._controller.getSelectedSignature();
1562 
1563 	if (!signatureId && !extraSignature) { return; }
1564 
1565 	var signature;
1566 
1567 	// for multi-account, search all accounts for this signature ID
1568 	if (appCtxt.multiAccounts) {
1569 		var ac = window.parentAppCtxt || window.appCtxt;
1570 		var list = ac.accountList.visibleAccounts;
1571 		for (var i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
1572 			var collection = appCtxt.getSignatureCollection(list[i]);
1573 			if (collection) {
1574 				signature = collection.getById(signatureId);
1575 				if (signature) {
1576 					break;
1577 				}
1578 			}
1579 		}
1580 	} else {
1581 		signature = appCtxt.getSignatureCollection().getById(signatureId);
1582 	}
1583 
1584 	if (!signature && !extraSignature) { return; }
1585 
1586 	mode = mode || this._composeMode;
1587 	var htmlMode = (mode === Dwt.HTML);
1588 	var sig = signature ? signature.getValue(htmlMode ? ZmMimeTable.TEXT_HTML : ZmMimeTable.TEXT_PLAIN) : "";
1589 	sig = AjxStringUtil.trim(sig + extraSignature) + (htmlMode ? "" : this._crlf);
1590 
1591 	return sig;
1592 };
1593 
1594 /**
1595  * Returns "" or extra signature (like a quote or legal disclaimer) via zimlet
1596  */
1597 ZmComposeView.prototype._getExtraSignature =
1598 function() {
1599 	var extraSignature = "";
1600 	if (appCtxt.zimletsPresent()) {
1601 		var buffer = [];
1602 		appCtxt.notifyZimlets("appendExtraSignature", [buffer]);
1603 		extraSignature = buffer.join(this._crlf);
1604 		if (extraSignature) {
1605 			extraSignature = this._crlf + extraSignature;
1606 		}
1607 	}
1608 	return extraSignature;
1609 };
1610 
1611 ZmComposeView.prototype._getSignatureSeparator =
1612 function(params) {
1613 
1614 	var sep = "";
1615 	params = params || {};
1616 	if (params.style === ZmSetting.SIG_INTERNET) {
1617 		var mode = params.mode || this._composeMode;
1618 		if (mode === Dwt.HTML) {
1619 			sep = "<div " + ZmComposeView.BC_HTML_MARKER_ATTR + "='" + params.marker + "'>-- " + this._crlf + "</div>";
1620 		}
1621 		else {
1622 			sep += "-- " + this._crlf;
1623 		}
1624 	}
1625 	return sep;
1626 };

1628 ZmComposeView.prototype._getSignatureIdForAction =
1629 function(identity, action) {
1630 
1631 	identity = identity || this.getIdentity();
1632 	action = action || this._action;
1633 	var field = (ZmComposeController.IS_REPLY[action] || ZmComposeController.IS_FORWARD[action]) ? ZmIdentity.REPLY_SIGNATURE : ZmIdentity.SIGNATURE;
1634 	return identity && identity.getField(field);
1635 };

1637 /**
1638 * Returns true if form contents have changed, or if they are empty.
1639 *
1640 * @param incAddrs		takes addresses into consideration
1641 * @param incSubject		takes subject into consideration
1642 * 
1643 * @private
1644 */
1645 ZmComposeView.prototype.isDirty =
1646 function(incAddrs, incSubject) {
1647 
1648 	if (this._isDirty) {
1649 		return true;
1650 	}
1651 
1652     // Addresses, Subject, non-html mode edit content
1653 	var curFormValue = this._formValue(incAddrs, incSubject);
1654     // Html editor content changed
1655     var htmlEditorDirty =  this._htmlEditor && this._htmlEditor.isDirty();
1656 
1657 	return (curFormValue !== this._origFormValue) || htmlEditorDirty;
1658 };

1660 ZmComposeView.prototype._removeAttachedFile  =
1661 function(spanId, attachmentPart) {
1662 
1663 	var node = document.getElementById(spanId)
1664 	var parent = node && node.parentNode;
1665 	this._attachCount--;
1666 
1667 	if (parent) {
1668 		parent.removeChild(node);
1669 	}
1670 
1671 	/* Not sure about the purpose of below code so commenting it out instead of deleting.
1672 	When a attachment is removed it should not change the original message. See bug 76776.
1673 
1674 	if (attachmentPart) {
1675 	var numAttachments = (this._msg &&  this._msg.attachments && this._msg.attachments.length ) || 0;
1676 		for (var i = 0; i < numAttachments; i++) {
1677 			if (this._msg.attachments[i].part === attachmentPart) {
1678 			   this._msg.attachments.splice(i, 1);
1679 			   break;
1680 			}
1681 		}
1682 	}*/
1683 
1684 	if (!parent.childNodes.length) {
1685 		this.cleanupAttachments(true);
1686 	}
1687 };

1689 ZmComposeView.prototype._removeAttachedMessage =
1690 function(spanId, id){
1691   
1692 	// Forward/Reply one message
1693 	if (!id) {
1694 		this._msgAttId = null;
1695 	}
1696 	else {
1697 		var index = this._msgIds && this._msgIds.length ? AjxUtil.indexOf(this._msgIds, id) : -1;
1698 		if (index !== -1) {
1699 			// Remove message from attached messages
1700 			this._msgIds.splice(index, 1);
1701 		}
1702 	}
1703 
1704 	this._removeAttachedFile(spanId);
1705 };

1707 ZmComposeView.prototype.cleanupAttachments =
1708 function(all) {
1709 
1710 	var attachDialog = this._attachDialog;
1711 	if (attachDialog && attachDialog.isPoppedUp()) {
1712 		attachDialog.popdown();
1713 	}
1714 
1715 	if (all) {
1716 		var hint = AjxEnv.supportsHTML5File && !this._disableAttachments ?
1717 			ZmMsg.dndTooltip : " ";
1718 
1719 		this._attcDiv.innerHTML =
1720 			AjxTemplate.expand('mail.Message#NoAttachments', { hint: hint });
1721 		this._attcDiv.style.height = "";
1722 		this._attachCount = 0;
1723 	}
1724 
1725 	// make sure att IDs don't get reused
1726 	if (this._msg) {
1727 		this._msg.attId = null;
1728 		this._msg._contactAttIds = [];
1729 	}
1730 };

1745 /**
1746  * Used in multi-account mode to determine which account this composer is
1747  * belongs to.
1748  */
1749 ZmComposeView.prototype.getFromAccount =
1750 function() {
1751 	var ac = window.parentAppCtxt || window.appCtxt;
1752 	return this._fromSelect
1753 		? (ac.accountList.getAccount(this._fromSelect.getSelectedOption().accountId))
1754 		: (ac.accountList.defaultAccount || ac.accountList.activeAccount || ac.accountList.mainAccount);
1755 };
1756 
1757 // Private / protected methods
1758 
1759 ZmComposeView.prototype._getForwardAttObjs =
1760 function(parts) {
1761 	var forAttObjs = [];
1762 	for (var i = 0; i < this._partToAttachmentMap.length; i++) {
1763 		for (var j = 0; j < parts.length; j++) {
1764 			if (this._partToAttachmentMap[i].part === parts[j]) {
1765 				forAttObjs.push( { part : parts[j], mid : this._partToAttachmentMap[i].mid } );
1766 				break;
1767 			}
1768 		}
1769 	}
1770 	return forAttObjs;
1771 };
1772 
1773 ZmComposeView.prototype._getForwardAttIds =
1774 function(name, removeOriginalAttachments) {
1775 
1776 	var forAttIds = [];
1777 	var forAttList = document.getElementsByName(name);
1778 
1779 	// walk collection of input elements
1780 	for (var i = 0; i < forAttList.length; i++) {
1781 			var part = forAttList[i].value;
1782 			if (this._partToAttachmentMap.length && removeOriginalAttachments) {
1783 				var att = this._partToAttachmentMap[i].part;
1784 				var original = this._originalAttachments[att.label];
1785 				original = original && [att.sizeInBytes];
1786 				if (removeOriginalAttachments && original) {
1787 					continue;
1788 				}
1789 			}
1790 			forAttIds.push(part);
1791 	}
1792 
1793 	return forAttIds;
1794 };
1795 
1796 /**
1797  * Set various address headers based on the original message and the mode we're in.
1798  * Make sure not to duplicate any addresses, even across fields. Figures out what
1799  * addresses to put in To: and Cc: unless the caller passes addresses to use (along
1800  * with their type).
1801  * 
1802  * @param {string}				action		compose action
1803  * @param {string}				type		address type
1804  * @param {AjxVector|array}		override	addresses to use
1805  */
1806 ZmComposeView.prototype._setAddresses =
1807 function(action, type, override) {
1808 
1809 	if (override) {
1810 		this._recipients.addAddresses(type, override);
1811 	}
1812 	else {
1813 		var identityId = this.identitySelect && this.identitySelect.getValue();
1814 		var addresses = ZmComposeView.getReplyAddresses(action, this._msg, this._origMsg, identityId);
1815 		if (addresses) {
1816 			var toAddrs = addresses[AjxEmailAddress.TO];
1817 			if (!(toAddrs && toAddrs.length)) {
1818 				// make sure we have at least one TO address if possible
1819 				var addrVec = this._origMsg.getAddresses(AjxEmailAddress.TO);
1820 				addresses[AjxEmailAddress.TO] = addrVec.getArray().slice(0, 1);
1821 			}
1822 			for (var i = 0; i < ZmMailMsg.COMPOSE_ADDRS.length; i++) {
1823 				var type = ZmMailMsg.COMPOSE_ADDRS[i];
1824 				this._recipients.addAddresses(type, addresses[type]);
1825 			}
1826 		}
1827 	}
1828 };
1829 
1830 ZmComposeView.getReplyAddresses =
1831 function(action, msg, addrsMsg, identityId) {
1832 		
1833 	addrsMsg = addrsMsg || msg;
1834 	var addresses = {};
1835 	if ((action == ZmOperation.NEW_MESSAGE) || !msg || !addrsMsg) {
1836 		return null;
1837 	}
1838 		
1839 	ZmComposeController._setStatics();
1840 	if (ZmComposeController.IS_REPLY[action]) {
1841 		var ac = window.parentAppCtxt || window.appCtxt;
1842 
1843 		// Prevent user's login name and aliases from becoming recipient addresses
1844 		var userAddrs = {};
1845 		var account = appCtxt.multiAccounts && msg.getAccount();
1846 		var uname = ac.get(ZmSetting.USERNAME, null, account);
1847 		if (uname) {
1848 			userAddrs[uname.toLowerCase()] = true;
1849 		}
1850 		var aliases = ac.get(ZmSetting.MAIL_ALIASES, null, account);
1851 		for (var i = 0, count = aliases.length; i < count; i++) {
1852 			userAddrs[aliases[i].toLowerCase()] = true;
1853 		}
1854 
1855 		// Check for canonical addresses
1856 		var defaultIdentity = ac.getIdentityCollection(account).defaultIdentity;
1857 		if (defaultIdentity && defaultIdentity.sendFromAddress) {
1858 			// Note: sendFromAddress is same as appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.USERNAME)
1859 			// if the account does not have any canonical address assigned.
1860 			userAddrs[defaultIdentity.sendFromAddress.toLowerCase()] = true;
1861 		}
1862 
1863 		// When updating address lists, use addresses msg instead of msg, because
1864 		// msg changes after a draft is saved.
1865 		var isDefaultIdentity = !identityId || (identityId && (defaultIdentity.id === identityId)); 
1866 		var addrVec = addrsMsg.getReplyAddresses(action, userAddrs, isDefaultIdentity, true);
1867 		addresses[AjxEmailAddress.TO] = addrVec ? addrVec.getArray() : [];
1868 		if (action === ZmOperation.REPLY_ALL || action === ZmOperation.CAL_REPLY_ALL) {
1869 			var toAddrs = addrsMsg.getAddresses(AjxEmailAddress.TO, userAddrs, false, true);
1870 			var ccAddrs = addrsMsg.getAddresses(AjxEmailAddress.CC, userAddrs, false, true);
1871 			toAddrs.addList(ccAddrs);
1872 			addresses[AjxEmailAddress.CC] = toAddrs.getArray();
1873 		}
1874 	} else if (action === ZmOperation.DRAFT || action === ZmOperation.SHARE) {
1875 		for (var i = 0; i < ZmMailMsg.COMPOSE_ADDRS.length; i++) {
1876 			var type = ZmMailMsg.COMPOSE_ADDRS[i];
1877 			var addrs = msg.getAddresses(type);
1878 			addresses[type] = addrs ? addrs.getArray() : [];
1879 		}
1880 	} else if (action === ZmOperation.DECLINE_PROPOSAL) {
1881 		var toAddrs = addrsMsg.getAddresses(AjxEmailAddress.FROM);
1882 		addresses[AjxEmailAddress.TO] = toAddrs ? toAddrs.getArray() : [];
1883 	}
1884 
1885 	if (action === ZmOperation.DRAFT) {
1886 		//don't mess with draft addresses, this is what the user wanted, this is what they'll get, including duplicates.
1887 		return addresses;
1888 	}
1889 
1890 	// Make a pass to remove duplicate addresses
1891 	var addresses1 = {}, used = {};
1892 	for (var i = 0; i < ZmMailMsg.COMPOSE_ADDRS.length; i++) {
1893 		var type = ZmMailMsg.COMPOSE_ADDRS[i];
1894 		var addrs1 = addresses1[type] = [];
1895 		var addrs = addresses[type];
1896 		if (addrs && addrs.length) {
1897 			for (var j = 0, len = addrs.length; j < len; j++) {
1898 				var addr = addrs[j];
1899 				if (!used[addr.address]) {
1900 					addrs1.push(addr);
1901 				}
1902 				used[addr.address] = true;
1903 			}
1904 		}
1905 	}
1906 	return addresses1;
1907 };
1908 
1909 ZmComposeView.prototype._setSubject =
1910 function(action, msg, subjOverride) {
1911 
1912 	if ((action === ZmOperation.NEW_MESSAGE && !subjOverride)) {
1913 		return;
1914 	}
1915 
1916 	var subj = subjOverride || (msg ? msg.subject : "");
1917 
1918 	if (action === ZmOperation.REPLY_CANCEL && !subj) {
1919 		var inv = msg && msg.invite;
1920 		if (inv) {
1921 			subj = inv.getName();
1922 		}
1923 	}
1924 
1925 	if (action !== ZmOperation.DRAFT && subj) {
1926 		subj = ZmMailMsg.stripSubjectPrefixes(subj);
1927 	}
1928 
1929 	var prefix = "";
1930 	switch (action) {
1931 		case ZmOperation.CAL_REPLY:
1932 		case ZmOperation.CAL_REPLY_ALL:
1933 		case ZmOperation.REPLY:
1934 		case ZmOperation.REPLY_ALL: 		prefix = "Re: "; break;
1935 		case ZmOperation.REPLY_CANCEL: 		prefix = ZmMsg.cancelled + ": "; break;
1936 		case ZmOperation.FORWARD_INLINE:
1937 		case ZmOperation.FORWARD_ATT: 		prefix = "Fwd: "; break;
1938 		case ZmOperation.REPLY_ACCEPT:		prefix = ZmMsg.subjectAccept + ": "; break;
1939 		case ZmOperation.REPLY_DECLINE:		prefix = ZmMsg.subjectDecline + ": "; break;
1940 		case ZmOperation.REPLY_TENTATIVE:	prefix = ZmMsg.subjectTentative + ": "; break;
1941 		case ZmOperation.REPLY_NEW_TIME:	prefix = ZmMsg.subjectNewTime + ": "; break;
1942 	}
1943 		
1944 	subj = this._subject = prefix + (subj || "");
1945 	if (this._subjectField) {
1946 		this._subjectField.value = subj;
1947 		this.updateTabTitle();
1948 	}
1949 };
1950 
1951 ZmComposeView.prototype._setBody =
1952 function(action, msg, extraBodyText, noEditorUpdate, keepAttachments) {
1953 		
1954 	this._setReturns();
1955 	var htmlMode = (this._composeMode === Dwt.HTML);
1956 
1957 	var isDraft = (action === ZmOperation.DRAFT);
1958 
1959 	// get reply/forward prefs as necessary
1960 	var incOptions = this._controller._curIncOptions;
1961 	var ac = window.parentAppCtxt || window.appCtxt;
1962 	if (!incOptions) {
1963 		if (ZmComposeController.IS_REPLY[action]) {
1964 			incOptions = {what:		ac.get(ZmSetting.REPLY_INCLUDE_WHAT),
1965 						  prefix:	ac.get(ZmSetting.REPLY_USE_PREFIX),
1966 						  headers:	ac.get(ZmSetting.REPLY_INCLUDE_HEADERS)};
1967 		} else if (isDraft) {
1968 			incOptions = {what:		ZmSetting.INC_BODY};
1969 		} else if (action === ZmOperation.FORWARD_INLINE) {
1970 			incOptions = {what:		ZmSetting.INC_BODY,
1971 						  prefix:	ac.get(ZmSetting.FORWARD_USE_PREFIX),
1972 						  headers:	ac.get(ZmSetting.FORWARD_INCLUDE_HEADERS)};
1973 		} else if (action === ZmOperation.FORWARD_ATT) {
1974 			incOptions = {what:		ZmSetting.INC_ATTACH};
1975 		} else if (action === ZmOperation.DECLINE_PROPOSAL) {
1976 			incOptions = {what:		ZmSetting.INC_BODY};
1977 		} else if (action === ZmOperation.NEW_MESSAGE) {
1978 			incOptions = {what:		ZmSetting.INC_NONE};
1979 		} else {
1980 			incOptions = {};
1981 		}
1982 		this._controller._curIncOptions = incOptions;	// pointer, not a copy
1983 	}
1984 	if (incOptions.what === ZmSetting.INC_ATTACH && !this._msg) {
1985 		incOptions.what = ZmSetting.INC_NONE;
1986 	}
1987 		
1988 	// make sure we've loaded the part with the type we want to reply in, if it's available
1989 	if (msg && (incOptions.what === ZmSetting.INC_BODY || incOptions.what === ZmSetting.INC_SMART)) {
1990 		var desiredPartType = htmlMode ? ZmMimeTable.TEXT_HTML : ZmMimeTable.TEXT_PLAIN;
1991 		msg.getBodyPart(desiredPartType, this._setBody1.bind(this, action, msg, extraBodyText, noEditorUpdate, keepAttachments));
1992 	}
1993 	else {
1994 		this._setBody1(action, msg, extraBodyText, noEditorUpdate, keepAttachments);
1995 	}
1996 };
1997 
1998 ZmComposeView.prototype._setReturns =
1999 function(mode) {
2000 	mode = mode || this._composeMode;
2001 	var htmlMode = (mode === Dwt.HTML);
2002 	this._crlf = htmlMode ? AjxStringUtil.CRLF_HTML : AjxStringUtil.CRLF;
2003 	this._crlf2 = htmlMode ? AjxStringUtil.CRLF2_HTML : AjxStringUtil.CRLF2;
2004 };

2006 // body components
2007 ZmComposeView.BC_NOTHING		= "NOTHING";		// marks beginning and ending
2008 ZmComposeView.BC_TEXT_PRE		= "TEXT_PRE";		// canned text (might be user-entered or some form of extraBodyText) 
2009 ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_PRE		= "SIG_PRE";		// a sig that goes above quoted text
2010 ZmComposeView.BC_DIVIDER		= "DIVIDER";		// tells reader that quoted text is coming
2011 ZmComposeView.BC_HEADERS		= "HEADERS";		// from original msg
2012 ZmComposeView.BC_QUOTED_TEXT	= "QUOTED_TEXT";	// quoted text
2013 ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_POST		= "SIG_POST";		// a sig that goes below quoted text

2016 		ZmComposeView.BC_NOTHING,
2017 		ZmComposeView.BC_TEXT_PRE,
2018 		ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_PRE,
2019 		ZmComposeView.BC_DIVIDER,
2020 		ZmComposeView.BC_HEADERS,
2021 		ZmComposeView.BC_QUOTED_TEXT,
2022 		ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_POST,
2023 		ZmComposeView.BC_NOTHING

2038 ZmComposeView.prototype._setBody1 =
2039 function(action, msg, extraBodyText, noEditorUpdate, keepAttachments) {
2040 		
2041 	var htmlMode = (this._composeMode === Dwt.HTML);
2042 	var isDraft = (action === ZmOperation.DRAFT);
2043 	var incOptions = this._controller._curIncOptions;
2044 
2045 	// clear in case of switching from "as attachment" back to "include original message" or to "don't include original"
2046 	this._msgAttId = null;
2047 
2048 	if (extraBodyText) {
2049 		this.setComponent(ZmComposeView.BC_TEXT_PRE, this._normalizeText(extraBodyText, htmlMode));
2050 	}
2051 
2052 	var compList = ZmComposeView.BC_ALL_COMPONENTS;
2053 		
2054 	if (action === ZmOperation.DRAFT) {
2055 		compList = [ZmComposeView.BC_QUOTED_TEXT];
2056 	}
2057 	else if (action === ZmOperation.REPLY_CANCEL) {
2058 		compList = [ZmComposeView.BC_TEXT_PRE, ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_PRE, ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_POST];
2059 	}
2060 	else if (incOptions.what === ZmSetting.INC_NONE || incOptions.what === ZmSetting.INC_ATTACH) {
2061 		compList = [ZmComposeView.BC_NOTHING, ZmComposeView.BC_TEXT_PRE, ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_PRE, ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_POST];
2062 		if (this._msg && incOptions.what == ZmSetting.INC_ATTACH) {
2063 			this._msgAttId = this._msg.id;
2064 		}
2065 	}
2066 
2067 	var isHtmlEditorInitd = this._htmlEditor && this._htmlEditor.isHtmlModeInited();
2068 	if (this._htmlEditor && !noEditorUpdate && !isHtmlEditorInitd) {
2069 		this._fixMultipartRelatedImages_onTimer(msg);
2070 		this._htmlEditor.addOnContentInitializedListener(this._saveComponentContent.bind(this));
2071 	}
2072 
2073 	var bodyInfo = {};
2074 	var what = incOptions.what;
2075 	if (msg && (what === ZmSetting.INC_BODY || what === ZmSetting.INC_SMART)) {
2076 		bodyInfo = this._getBodyContent(msg, htmlMode, what);
2077 	}
2078 	var params = {action:action, msg:msg, incOptions:incOptions, bodyInfo:bodyInfo};
2079 	var value = this._layoutBodyComponents(compList, null, params);
2080 		
2081 	if (this._htmlEditor && !noEditorUpdate) {
2082 		this._htmlEditor.setContent(value);
2083 	    if (!htmlMode && ZmComposeController.IS_REPLY[action]) {
2084                 this._setBodyFieldCursor();
2085            }
2086 	}
2087 		
2088 	if (isHtmlEditorInitd && !noEditorUpdate) {
2089 		this._fixMultipartRelatedImages_onTimer(msg);
2090 		this._saveComponentContent();
2091 	}
2092 
2093 	var ac = window.parentAppCtxt || window.appCtxt;
2094 	var hasInlineImages = (bodyInfo.hasInlineImages) || !ac.get(ZmSetting.VIEW_AS_HTML);
2095 	if (!keepAttachments) {
2096 		//do not call this when switching between text and html editor.
2097 		this._showForwardField(msg || this._msg, action, incOptions, hasInlineImages, bodyInfo.hasInlineAtts);
2098 	}
2099 
2100 	var sigId = this._controller.getSelectedSignature();
2101 	if (sigId && !isDraft) {
2102 		this._attachSignatureVcard(sigId);
2103 	}
2104 
2105 	if (!this._htmlEditor && htmlMode) {
2106 		// wrap <html> and <body> tags around content, and set font style
2107 		value = ZmHtmlEditor._embedHtmlContent(value, true);
2108 	}
2109 				
2110 	this._bodyContent[this._composeMode] = value;
2111 };

2113 /**
2114  * Sets the value of the given component.
2115  * 
2116  * @param {string}		comp		component identifier (ZmComposeView.BC_*)
2117  * @param {string}		compValue	value
2118  * @param {string}		mode		compose mode
2119  */
2120 ZmComposeView.prototype.setComponent =
2121 function(comp, compValue, mode) {
2122 
2123 	this._components[Dwt.TEXT] = this._components[Dwt.TEXT] || {};
2124 	this._components[Dwt.HTML] = this._components[Dwt.HTML] || {};
2125 
2126 	mode = mode || this._composeMode;
2127 	this._components[mode][comp] = compValue;
2128 };

2130 /**
2131  * Returns the current value of the given component.
2132  * 
2133  * @param {string}		comp		component identifier (ZmComposeView.BC_*)
2134  * @param {string}		mode		compose mode
2135  * @param {hash}		params		msg, include options, and compose mode
2136  */
2137 ZmComposeView.prototype.getComponent =
2138 function(comp, mode, params) {
2139 		
2140 	mode = mode || this._composeMode;
2141 	var value = this._components[mode] && this._components[mode][comp];
2142 	if (value) {
2143 		return value;
2144 	}
2145 
2146 	switch (comp) {
2147 		case ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_PRE: {
2148 			return this._getSignatureComponent(ZmSetting.SIG_OUTLOOK, mode);
2149 		}
2150 		case ZmComposeView.BC_DIVIDER: {
2151 			return this._getDivider(mode, params);
2152 		}
2153 		case ZmComposeView.BC_HEADERS: {
2154 			return this._getHeaders(mode, params);
2155 		}
2156 		case ZmComposeView.BC_QUOTED_TEXT: {
2157 			return this._getBodyComponent(mode, params || {});
2158 		}
2159 		case ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_POST:
2160 			return this._getSignatureComponent(ZmSetting.SIG_INTERNET, mode);
2161 	}
2162 };

2164 /**
2165  * Returns true if the given component is part of the compose body.
2166  * 
2167  * @param {string}		comp		component identifier (ZmComposeView.BC_*)
2168  */
2169 ZmComposeView.prototype.hasComponent =
2170 function(comp) {
2171 	return AjxUtil.arrayContains(this._compList, comp);
2172 };

2174 /**
2175  * Takes the given list of components and returns the text that represents the aggregate of
2176  * their content.
2177  * 
2178  * @private
2179  * @param {array}	components		list of component IDs
2180  * @param {hash}	params			msg, include options, and compose mode
2181  */
2182 ZmComposeView.prototype._layoutBodyComponents =
2183 function(components, mode, params) {
2184 		
2185 	if (!(components && components.length)) {
2186 		return "";
2187 	}
2188 		
2189 	mode = mode || this._composeMode;
2190 	var htmlMode = (mode === Dwt.HTML);
2191 	this._headerText = "";
2192 	this._compList = [];
2193 	var value = "";
2194 	var prevComp, prevValue;
2195 	for (var i = 0; i < components.length; i++) {
2196 		var comp = components[i];
2197 		var compValue = this.getComponent(comp, mode, params) || "";
2198 		var spacing = (prevComp && compValue) ? this._getComponentSpacing(prevComp, comp, prevValue, compValue) : "";
2199 		if (compValue || (comp === ZmComposeView.BC_NOTHING)) {
2200 			prevComp = comp;
2201 			prevValue = compValue;
2202 		}
2203 		if (compValue) {
2204 			if (!htmlMode) {
2205 				compValue = this._getMarker(Dwt.TEXT, comp) + compValue;
2206 			}
2207 			value += spacing + compValue;
2208 			this._compList.push(comp);
2209 		}
2210 	}
2211 
2212 	return value;
2213 };
2214 
2215 ZmComposeView.prototype._getMarker =
2216 function(mode, comp) {
2217 	return (this._marker && this._marker[mode] &&  this._marker[mode][comp]) || "";
2218 };

2220 // Chart for determining number of blank lines between non-empty components.
2221 ZmComposeView.BC_SPACING = AjxUtil.arrayAsHash(ZmComposeView.BC_ALL_COMPONENTS,
2222                                                function() { return Object() });
2223 
2224 ZmComposeView.BC_SPACING[ZmComposeView.BC_NOTHING][ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_PRE]		= 2;
2225 ZmComposeView.BC_SPACING[ZmComposeView.BC_NOTHING][ZmComposeView.BC_DIVIDER]		= 2;
2226 ZmComposeView.BC_SPACING[ZmComposeView.BC_NOTHING][ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_POST]		= 2;
2227 ZmComposeView.BC_SPACING[ZmComposeView.BC_TEXT_PRE][ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_PRE]		= 1;
2228 ZmComposeView.BC_SPACING[ZmComposeView.BC_TEXT_PRE][ZmComposeView.BC_DIVIDER]		= 1;
2229 ZmComposeView.BC_SPACING[ZmComposeView.BC_TEXT_PRE][ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_POST]		= 1;
2230 ZmComposeView.BC_SPACING[ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_PRE][ZmComposeView.BC_DIVIDER]		= 1;
2231 ZmComposeView.BC_SPACING[ZmComposeView.BC_DIVIDER][ZmComposeView.BC_QUOTED_TEXT]	= 1;
2232 ZmComposeView.BC_SPACING[ZmComposeView.BC_HEADERS][ZmComposeView.BC_QUOTED_TEXT]	= 1;
2233 ZmComposeView.BC_SPACING[ZmComposeView.BC_QUOTED_TEXT][ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_POST]	= 1;

2235 // Returns the proper amount of space (blank lines) between two components.
2236 ZmComposeView.prototype._getComponentSpacing =
2237 function(comp1, comp2, val1, val2) {
2238 
2239 	if (!(comp1 && comp2)) {
2240 		return "";
2241 	}
2242 		
2243 	val1 = val1 || !!(this.getComponent(comp1) || comp1 == ZmComposeView.BC_NOTHING);
2244 	val2 = val2 || !!(this.getComponent(comp2) || comp2 == ZmComposeView.BC_NOTHING);
2245 		
2246 	var num = (val1 && val2) && ZmComposeView.BC_SPACING[comp1][comp2];
2247 	// special case - HTML with headers or prefixes will create space after divider, so we don't need to add spacing
2248 	var incOptions = this._controller._curIncOptions;
2249 	var htmlMode = (this._composeMode === Dwt.HTML);
2250 	if (htmlMode && comp1 === ZmComposeView.BC_DIVIDER && comp2 === ZmComposeView.BC_QUOTED_TEXT &&
2251 			(incOptions.prefix || incOptions.headers)) {
2252 		num = 0;
2253 	}
2254 	// minimize the gap between two BLOCKQUOTE sections (which have the blue line on the left)
2255 	if (htmlMode && comp1 === ZmComposeView.BC_HEADERS && comp2 === ZmComposeView.BC_QUOTED_TEXT && incOptions.prefix) {
2256 		num = 0;
2257 	}
2258 
2259 	return (num === 2) ? this._crlf2 : (num === 1) ? this._crlf : "";
2260 };
2261 
2262 ZmComposeView.prototype._getSignatureComponent =
2263 function(style, mode) {
2264 		
2265 	var value = "";
2266 	var ac = window.parentAppCtxt || window.appCtxt;
2267 	var account = ac.multiAccounts && this.getFromAccount();
2268 	if (ac.get(ZmSetting.SIGNATURES_ENABLED, null, account) && ac.get(ZmSetting.SIGNATURE_STYLE, null, account) === style) {
2269 		var comp = (style === ZmSetting.SIG_OUTLOOK) ? ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_PRE : ZmComposeView.BC_SIG_POST;
2270 		var params = {
2271 			style:		style,
2272 			account:	account,
2273 			mode:		mode,
2274 			marker:		this._getMarker(mode, comp)
2275 		}
2276 		value = this._getSignatureContentSpan(params);
2277 	}
2278 	return value;
2279 };

2281 ZmComposeView.prototype._getDivider =
2282 function(mode, params) {
2283 
2284 	mode = mode || this._composeMode;
2285 	var htmlMode = (mode === Dwt.HTML);
2286 	var action = (params && params.action) || this._action;
2287 	var msg = (params && params.msg) || this._msg;
2288 	var incOptions = (params && params.incOptions) || this._controller._curIncOptions;
2289 	var preface = "";
2290 	var marker = htmlMode && this._getMarker(mode, ZmComposeView.BC_DIVIDER);
2291 	if (incOptions && incOptions.headers) {
2292 		// divider is just a visual separator if there are headers below it
2293 		if (htmlMode) {
2294 			preface = '<hr id="' + AjxStringUtil.HTML_SEP_ID + '" ' + ZmComposeView.BC_HTML_MARKER_ATTR + '="' + marker + '">';
2295 		} else {
2296 			var msgText = (action === ZmOperation.FORWARD_INLINE) ? AjxMsg.forwardedMessage : AjxMsg.origMsg;
2297 			preface = [ZmMsg.DASHES, " ", msgText, " ", ZmMsg.DASHES, this._crlf].join("");
2298 		}
2299 	}
2300 	else if (msg) {
2301 		// no headers, so summarize them by showing date, time, name, email
2302 		var msgDate = msg.sentDate || msg.date;
2303 		var now = new Date(msgDate);
2304 		var date = AjxDateFormat.getDateInstance(AjxDateFormat.MEDIUM).format(now);
2305 		var time = AjxDateFormat.getTimeInstance(AjxDateFormat.SHORT).format(now);
2306 		var fromAddr = msg.getAddress(AjxEmailAddress.FROM);
2307 		var fromName = fromAddr && fromAddr.getName();
2308 		var fromEmail = fromAddr && fromAddr.getAddress();
2309 		var address = fromName;
2310 		if (fromEmail) {
2311 			fromEmail = htmlMode ? AjxStringUtil.htmlEncode("<" + fromEmail + ">") : fromEmail;
2312 			address = [address, fromEmail].join(" "); 
2313 		}
2314 		preface = AjxMessageFormat.format(ZmMsg.replyPrefix, [date, time, address]);
2315 		preface += this._crlf;
2316 		if (htmlMode) {
2317 			preface = '<span id="' + AjxStringUtil.HTML_SEP_ID + '" ' + ZmComposeView.BC_HTML_MARKER_ATTR + '="' + marker + '">' + preface + '</span>';
2318 		}
2319 	}
2320 		
2321 	return preface;
2322 };
