2324 ZmComposeView.prototype._getHeaders =
2325 function(mode, params) {
2326 
2327 	mode = mode || this._composeMode;
2328 	var htmlMode = (mode === Dwt.HTML);
2329 	params = params || {};
2330 	var action = (params && params.action) || this._action;
2331 	var msg = (params && params.msg) || this._msg;
2332 	var incOptions = (params && params.incOptions) || this._controller._curIncOptions;
2333 
2334 	var value = "";
2335 	var headers = [];
2336 	if (incOptions.headers && msg) {
2337 		for (var i = 0; i < ZmComposeView.QUOTED_HDRS.length; i++) {
2338 			var hdr = msg.getHeaderStr(ZmComposeView.QUOTED_HDRS[i], htmlMode);
2339 			if (hdr) {
2340 				headers.push(hdr);
2341 			}
2342 		}
2343 	}
2344 
2345 	if (headers.length) {
2346 		//TODO: this could be simplified and maybe refactored with the similar code in _getBodyComponent()
2347 		//(see bug 91743)
2348 		//Revisit this after the release.
2349 		var text = headers.join(this._crlf) + this._crlf;
2350 		var wrapParams = {
2351 			text:				text,
2352 			preserveReturns:	true,
2353 			htmlMode:			htmlMode,
2354 			isHeaders:			true
2355 		}
2356 		var marker = this._getMarker(Dwt.HTML, ZmComposeView.BC_HEADERS);
2357 		if (incOptions.prefix) {
2358 			incOptions.pre = !htmlMode && appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.REPLY_PREFIX);
2359 			wrapParams.prefix = incOptions.pre;
2360 			if (htmlMode) {
2361 				wrapParams.before = '<div ' + ZmComposeView.BC_HTML_MARKER_ATTR + '="' + marker + '">' + AjxStringUtil.HTML_QUOTE_PREFIX_PRE;
2362 				wrapParams.after = AjxStringUtil.HTML_QUOTE_PREFIX_POST + '</div>';
2363 			}
2364 			value = AjxStringUtil.wordWrap(wrapParams);
2365 		}
2366 		else if (htmlMode) {
2367 			wrapParams.before = '<div ' + ZmComposeView.BC_HTML_MARKER_ATTR + '="' + marker + '">';
2368 			wrapParams.after = '</div>';
2369 			value = AjxStringUtil.wordWrap(wrapParams);
2370 		}
2371 		else {
2372 			value = text;
2373 		}
2374 	}
2375 
2376 	return value;
2377 };

2379 ZmComposeView.prototype._getBodyComponent =
2380 function(mode, params) {
2381 
2382 	mode = mode || this._composeMode;
2383 	params = params || {};
2384 	var action = (params && params.action) || this._action;
2385 	var htmlMode = (mode === Dwt.HTML);
2386 	var msg = (params && params.msg) || this._msg;
2387 	var incOptions = (params && params.incOptions) || this._controller._curIncOptions;
2388 	var what = incOptions.what;
2389 	var bodyInfo = params.bodyInfo || this._getBodyContent(msg, htmlMode, what);
2390 
2391 	var value = "";
2392 	var body = "";
2393 	if (msg && (what === ZmSetting.INC_BODY || what === ZmSetting.INC_SMART)) {
2394 		body = bodyInfo.body;
2395 		// Bug 7160: Strip off the ~*~*~*~ from invite replies.
2396 		if (ZmComposeController.IS_INVITE_REPLY[action]) {
2397 			body = body.replace(ZmItem.NOTES_SEPARATOR, "");
2398 		}
2399 		if (htmlMode && body) {
2400 			body = this._normalizeText(body, htmlMode);
2401 		}
2402 	}
2403 
2404 	body = AjxStringUtil.trim(body);
2405 	if (body) {
2406 		//TODO: this could be simplified and maybe refactored with the similar code in _getHeaders()
2407 		//(see bug 91743)
2408 		//Revisit this after the release.
2409 		var wrapParams = {
2410 			text:				body,
2411 			preserveReturns:	true,
2412 			htmlMode:			htmlMode
2413 		}
2414 		if (htmlMode) {
2415 			var marker = this._getMarker(Dwt.HTML, ZmComposeView.BC_QUOTED_TEXT);
2416 			if (incOptions.prefix) {
2417 				wrapParams.before = '<div ' + ZmComposeView.BC_HTML_MARKER_ATTR + '="' + marker + '">' + AjxStringUtil.HTML_QUOTE_PREFIX_PRE;
2418 				wrapParams.after = AjxStringUtil.HTML_QUOTE_PREFIX_POST + '</div>';
2419 				wrapParams.prefix = appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.REPLY_PREFIX);
2420 			}
2421 			else {
2422 				wrapParams.before = '<div ' + ZmComposeView.BC_HTML_MARKER_ATTR + '="' + marker + '">';
2423 				wrapParams.after = '</div>';
2424 			}
2425 			value = AjxStringUtil.wordWrap(wrapParams);
2426 		}
2427 		else {
2428 			if (incOptions.prefix) {
2429 				wrapParams.prefix = appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.REPLY_PREFIX);
2430 				value = AjxStringUtil.wordWrap(wrapParams);
2431 			}
2432 			else {
2433 				value = body;
2434 			}
2435 		}
2436 	}
2437 
2438 	return value;
2439 };

2441 ZmComposeView.prototype._removeMarkers =
2442 function(text) {
2443 	return text.replace(/\u200B|\u200C|\u200D|\uFEFF/g, "");
2444 };
2445 
2446 ZmComposeView.prototype._normalizeText =
2447 function(text, isHtml) {
2448 		
2449 	text = AjxStringUtil.trim(text);
2450 	if (isHtml) {
2451         text = AjxStringUtil.trimHtml(text);
2452 	}
2453 	else {
2454 		text = this._removeMarkers(text);
2455 		text = text.replace(/\n+$/g, "\n");	// compress trailing line returns
2456 	}
2457 
2458 	return AjxStringUtil._NON_WHITESPACE.test(text) ? text + this._crlf : "";
2459 };

2461 /**
2462  * Returns the value of the given component as extracted from the content of the editor.
2463  * 
2464  * @param {string}		comp		component identifier (ZmComposeView.BC_*)
2465  */
2466 ZmComposeView.prototype.getComponentContent =
2467 function(comp) {
2468 	
2469 	var htmlMode = (this._composeMode === Dwt.HTML);
2470 	var content = this._getEditorContent(true);
2471 	var marker = this._getMarker(this._composeMode, comp);
2472 	var compContent = "";
2473 
2474 	var firstComp = this._compList[0];
2475 	for (var i = 0; i < this._compList.length; i++) {
2476 		if (this._compList[i] === comp) { break; }
2477 	}
2478 	var nextComp = this._compList[i + 1];
2479 	var lastComp = this._compList[this._compList.length - 1];
2480 	
2481 	if (htmlMode) {
2482 		var idx1 = content.indexOf(marker);
2483 		if (idx1 !== -1) {
2484 			var chunk = content.substring(0, idx1);
2485 			// found the marker (an element ID), now back up to opening of tag
2486 			idx1 = chunk.lastIndexOf("<");
2487 			if (idx1 !== -1) {
2488 				if (comp === lastComp) {
2489 					compContent = content.substring(idx1);
2490 				}
2491 				else {
2492 					marker = this._getMarker(Dwt.HTML, nextComp);
2493 					var idx2 = marker && content.indexOf(marker);
2494 					if (idx2 !== -1) {
2495 						chunk = content.substring(0, idx2);
2496 						idx2 = chunk.lastIndexOf("<");
2497 						if (idx2 !== -1) {
2498 							compContent = content.substring(idx1, idx2);
2499 						}
2500 					}
2501 				}
2502 			}
2503 		}
2504 	}
2505 	else {
2506 		var idx1 = content.indexOf(marker);
2507 		if (idx1 !== -1 && comp === lastComp) {
2508 			// last component, include everything up to end of content
2509 			compContent = content.substring(idx1 + 1);
2510 		}
2511 		else {
2512 			marker = this._getMarker(this._composeMode, nextComp);
2513 			var idx2 = content.indexOf(marker);
2514 			if (idx2 !== -1 && comp === firstComp) {
2515 				// first component, include everything from beginning of content
2516 				compContent = content.substring(0, idx2);
2517 			}
2518 			else if (idx1 !== -1 && idx2 !== -1) {
2519 				// middle component, include everything between the two markers
2520 				compContent = content.substring(idx1 + 1, idx2);
2521 			}
2522 		}
2523 	}
2524 
2525 	return this._normalizeText(compContent, htmlMode);
2526 };
2527 
2528 ZmComposeView.prototype._saveComponentContent =
2529 function() {
2530 	this._compContent = {};
2531 	for (var i = 0; i < this._compList.length; i++) {
2532 		var comp = this._compList[i];
2533 		this._compContent[comp] = this.getComponentContent(comp);
2534 	}
2535 };
2536 
2537 ZmComposeView.prototype.componentContentChanged =
2538 function(comp) {
2539 	return this._compContent && this.hasComponent(comp) && (this._compContent[comp] !== this.getComponentContent(comp));
2540 };

2542 /**
2543  * Returns text that the user has typed into the editor, as long as it comes first.
2544  */
2545 ZmComposeView.prototype.getUserText =
2546 function() {
2547 		
2548 	var htmlMode = (this._composeMode === Dwt.HTML);
2549 	var content = this._getEditorContent(true);
2550 	var userText = content;
2551 	if (htmlMode) {
2552 		var firstComp;
2553 		for (var i = 0; i < this._compList.length; i++) {
2554 			if (this._compList[i] !== ZmComposeView.BC_TEXT_PRE) {
2555 				firstComp = this._compList[i];
2556 				break;
2557 			}
2558 		}
2559 		var marker = this._getMarker(this._composeMode, firstComp);
2560 		var idx = content.indexOf(marker);
2561 		if (idx !== -1) {
2562 			var chunk = content.substring(0, idx);
2563 			// found the marker (an element ID), now back up to opening of tag
2564 			idx = chunk.lastIndexOf("<");
2565 			if (idx !== -1) {
2566 				// grab everything before the marked element
2567 				userText = chunk.substring(0, idx);
2568 			}
2569 		}
2570 	}
2571 	else {
2572 		if (this.hasComponent(ZmComposeView.BC_TEXT_PRE)) {
2573 			userText = this.getComponentContent(ZmComposeView.BC_TEXT_PRE);
2574 		}
2575 		else if (this._compList.length > 0) {
2576 			var idx = content.indexOf(this._getMarker(this._composeMode, this._compList[0]));
2577 			if (idx !== -1) {
2578 				userText = content.substring(0, idx);
2579 			}
2580 		}
2581 	}
2582 				
2583 	return this._normalizeText(userText, htmlMode);
2584 };

2586 // Returns the block of quoted text from the editor, so that we can see if the user has changed it.
2587 ZmComposeView.prototype._getQuotedText =
2588 function() {
2589 	return this.getComponentContent(ZmComposeView.BC_QUOTED_TEXT);
2590 };
2591 
2592 // If the user has changed the section of quoted text (eg by inline replying), preserve the changes
2593 // across whatever operation the user is performing. If we're just checking whether changes can be
2594 // preserved, return true if they can be preserved (otherwise we need to warn the user).
2595 ZmComposeView.prototype._preserveQuotedText =
2596 function(op, quotedText, check) {
2597 
2598 	var savedQuotedText = this._compContent && this._compContent[ZmComposeView.BC_QUOTED_TEXT];
2599 	if (check && !savedQuotedText) {
2600 		return true;
2601 	}
2602 	quotedText = quotedText || this._getQuotedText();
2603 	var changed = (quotedText !== savedQuotedText);
2604 	if (check && (!quotedText || !changed)) {
2605 		return true;
2606 	}
2607 
2608 	// track whether user has changed quoted text during this compose session
2609 	this._quotedTextChanged = this._quotedTextChanged || changed;
2610 
2611 	if (op === ZmId.OP_ADD_SIGNATURE || op === ZmOperation.INCLUDE_HEADERS || (this._quotedTextChanged && !changed)) {
2612 		// just retain quoted text as is, no conversion needed
2613 	}
2614 	if (op === ZmOperation.USE_PREFIX) {
2615 		if (check) {
2616 			return true;
2617 		}
2618 		var htmlMode = (this._composeMode === Dwt.HTML);
2619 		var incOptions = this._controller._curIncOptions;
2620 		if (incOptions.prefix) {
2621 			var wrapParams = {
2622 				text:				quotedText,
2623 				htmlMode:			htmlMode,
2624 				preserveReturns:	true,
2625 				prefix:				appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.REPLY_PREFIX)
2626 			}
2627 			if (htmlMode) {
2628 				var marker = this._getMarker(Dwt.HTML, ZmComposeView.BC_QUOTED_TEXT);
2629 				wrapParams.before = '<div ' + ZmComposeView.BC_HTML_MARKER_ATTR + '="' + marker + '">' + AjxStringUtil.HTML_QUOTE_PREFIX_PRE;
2630 				wrapParams.after = AjxStringUtil.HTML_QUOTE_PREFIX_POST + '</div>';
2631 			}
2632 			quotedText = AjxStringUtil.wordWrap(wrapParams);
2633 		}
2634 		else {
2635 			if (htmlMode) {
2636 				quotedText = this._removeHtmlPrefix(quotedText);
2637 			}
2638 			else {
2639 				quotedText = quotedText.replace(/^> /, "");
2640 				quotedText = quotedText.replace(/\n> /g, "\n");
2641 			}
2642 		}
2643 	}
2644 	else if (ZmComposeController.INC_MAP[op]) {
2645 		return false;
2646 	}
2647 	else if (op === ZmOperation.FORMAT_HTML || op === ZmOperation.FORMAT_TEXT) {
2648 		if (check) {
2649 			return true;
2650 		}
2651 		if (op === ZmOperation.FORMAT_HTML) {
2652 			var marker = this._getMarker(Dwt.HTML, ZmComposeView.BC_QUOTED_TEXT);
2653 			var openTag = '<div ' + ZmComposeView.BC_HTML_MARKER_ATTR + '="' + marker + '">' + AjxStringUtil.HTML_QUOTE_PREFIX_PRE;
2654 			var closeTag = AjxStringUtil.HTML_QUOTE_PREFIX_POST + '</div>';
2655 			quotedText = AjxStringUtil.convertToHtml(quotedText, true, openTag, closeTag);
2656 		}
2657 		else {
2658 			quotedText = this._htmlToText(quotedText);
2659 		}
2660 	}
2661 
2662 	if (!check) {
2663 		this.setComponent(ZmComposeView.BC_QUOTED_TEXT, quotedText);
2664 	}
2665 		
2666 	return true;
2667 };
2668 
2669 // Removes the first level of <blockquote> styling
2670 ZmComposeView.prototype._removeHtmlPrefix =
2671 function(html, prefixEl) {
2672 	prefixEl = prefixEl || "blockquote";
2673 	var oldDiv = Dwt.parseHtmlFragment(html);
2674 	var newDiv = document.createElement("div");
2675 	newDiv[ZmComposeView.BC_HTML_MARKER_ATTR] = this._getMarker(Dwt.HTML, ZmComposeView.BC_QUOTED_TEXT);
2676 	while (oldDiv.childNodes.length) {
2677 		var el = oldDiv.childNodes[0];
2678 		if (el.nodeName.toLowerCase() === prefixEl) {
2679 			while (el.childNodes.length) {
2680 				newDiv.appendChild(el.removeChild(el.childNodes[0]));
2681 			}
2682 			oldDiv.removeChild(el);
2683 		}
2684 		else {
2685 			newDiv.appendChild(oldDiv.removeChild(el));
2686 		}
2687 	}
2688 	
2689 	return newDiv.outerHTML;
2690 };
2691 
2692 /**
2693  * Returns true unless changes have been made to quoted text and they cannot be preserved.
2694  * 
2695  * @param 	{string}	op			action user is performing
2696  * @param	{string}	quotedText	quoted text (optional)
2697  */
2698 ZmComposeView.prototype.canPreserveQuotedText =
2699 function(op, quotedText) {
2700 	return this._preserveQuotedText(op, quotedText, true);
2701 };
2702 
2703 ZmComposeView.prototype._getBodyContent =
2704 function(msg, htmlMode, incWhat) {
2705 
2706 	var body, bodyPart, hasInlineImages, hasInlineAtts;
2707 	var crlf = htmlMode ? AjxStringUtil.CRLF_HTML : AjxStringUtil.CRLF;
2708 	var crlf2 = htmlMode ? AjxStringUtil.CRLF2_HTML : AjxStringUtil.CRLF2;
2709 	var getOrig = (incWhat === ZmSetting.INC_SMART);
2710 
2711 	var content;
2712 		
2713 	// bug fix #7271 - if we have multiple body parts, append them all first
2714 	var parts = msg.getBodyParts();
2715 	if (msg.hasMultipleBodyParts()) {
2716 		var bodyArr = [];
2717 		for (var k = 0; k < parts.length; k++) {
2718 			var part = parts[k];
2719 			// bug: 28741
2720 			if (ZmMimeTable.isRenderableImage(part.contentType)) {
2721 				bodyArr.push([crlf, "[", part.contentType, ":", (part.fileName || "..."), "]", crlf].join(""));
2722 				hasInlineImages = true;
2723 			} else if (part.fileName && part.contentDisposition === "inline") {
2724 				var attInfo = ZmMimeTable.getInfo(part.contentType);
2725 				attInfo = attInfo ? attInfo.desc : part.contentType;
2726 				bodyArr.push([crlf, "[", attInfo, ":", (part.fileName||"..."), "]", crlf].join(""));
2727 				hasInlineAtts = true;
2728 			} else if (part.contentType === ZmMimeTable.TEXT_PLAIN || (part.body && ZmMimeTable.isTextType(part.contentType))) {
2729 				content = getOrig ? AjxStringUtil.getOriginalContent(part.getContent(), false) : part.getContent();
2730 				bodyArr.push( htmlMode ? AjxStringUtil.convertToHtml(content) : content );
2731 			} else if (part.contentType === ZmMimeTable.TEXT_HTML) {
2732 				content = getOrig ? AjxStringUtil.getOriginalContent(part.getContent(), true) : part.getContent();
2733 				if (htmlMode) {
2734 					bodyArr.push(content);
2735 				} else {
2736 					var div = document.createElement("div");
2737 					div.innerHTML = content;
2738 					bodyArr.push(AjxStringUtil.convertHtml2Text(div));
2739 				}
2740 			}
2741 		}
2742 		body = bodyArr.join(crlf);
2743 	} else {
2744 		// at this point, we should have the type of part we want if we're dealing with multipart/alternative
2745 		if (htmlMode) {
2746 			content = msg.getBodyContent(ZmMimeTable.TEXT_HTML);
2747 			if (!content) {
2748 				// just grab the first body part and convert it to HTML
2749 				content = AjxStringUtil.convertToHtml(msg.getBodyContent());
2750 			}
2751 			body = getOrig ? AjxStringUtil.getOriginalContent(content, true) : content;
2752 		} else {
2753 			hasInlineImages = msg.hasInlineImagesInMsgBody();
2754 			bodyPart = msg.getTextBodyPart();
2755 			if (bodyPart) {
2756 				// cool, got a textish body part
2757 				content = bodyPart.getContent();
2758 			}
2759 			else {
2760 				// if we can find an HTML body part, convert it to text
2761 				var html = msg.getBodyContent(ZmMimeTable.TEXT_HTML, true);
2762 				content = html ? this._htmlToText(html) : "";
2763 			}
2764 			content = content || msg.getBodyContent();	// just grab first body part
2765 			body = getOrig ? AjxStringUtil.getOriginalContent(content, false) : content;
2766 		}
2767 	}
2768 
2769 	body = body || "";
2770 		
2771 	if (bodyPart && AjxUtil.isObject(bodyPart) && bodyPart.isTruncated) {
2772 		body += crlf2 + ZmMsg.messageTruncated + crlf2;
2773 	}
2774 		
2775 	if (!this._htmlEditor && this.getComposeMode() === Dwt.HTML) {
2776 		// strip wrapper tags from original msg
2777 		body = body.replace(/<\/?(html|head|body)[^>]*>/gi, '');
2778 	}
2779 
2780 	return {body:body, bodyPart:bodyPart, hasInlineImages:hasInlineImages, hasInlineAtts:hasInlineAtts};
2781 };
2782 
2783 ZmComposeView.BQ_BEGIN	= "BQ_BEGIN";
2784 ZmComposeView.BQ_END	= "BQ_END";
2785 
2786 ZmComposeView.prototype._htmlToText =
2787 function(html) {
2788 
2789 	var convertor = {
2790 		"blockquote": function(el) {
2791 			return "\n" + ZmComposeView.BQ_BEGIN + "\n";
2792 		},
2793 		"/blockquote": function(el) {
2794 			return "\n" + ZmComposeView.BQ_END + "\n";
2795 		},
2796 		"_after": AjxCallback.simpleClosure(this._applyHtmlPrefix, this, ZmComposeView.BQ_BEGIN, ZmComposeView.BQ_END)
2797 	}
2798 	return AjxStringUtil.convertHtml2Text(html, convertor);
2799 };
2800 
2801 ZmComposeView.prototype._applyHtmlPrefix =
2802 function(tagStart, tagEnd, text) {
2803 
2804 	var incOptions = this._controller._curIncOptions;
2805 	if (incOptions && incOptions.prefix) {
2806 		var wrapParams = {
2807 			preserveReturns:	true,
2808 			prefix:				appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.REPLY_PREFIX)
2809 		}
2810 
2811 		var lines = text.split("\n");
2812 		var level = 0;
2813 		var out = [];
2814 		var k = 0;
2815 		for (var i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
2816 			var line = lines[i];
2817 			if (line === tagStart) {
2818 				level++;
2819 			} else if (line === tagEnd) {
2820 				level--;
2821 			} else {
2822 				if (!line) {
2823 					var lastLine = lines[i-1];
2824 					if (lastLine && (lastLine !== tagStart && lastLine !== tagEnd)) {
2825 						out[k++] = line;
2826 					}
2827 				} else {
2828 					for (var j = 0; j < level; j++) {
2829 						wrapParams.text = line;
2830 						line = AjxStringUtil.wordWrap(wrapParams);
2831 					}
2832 					line = line.replace(/^\n|\n$/, "");
2833 					out[k++] = line;
2834 				}
2835 			}
2836 		}
2837 		return out.join("\n");
2838 	} else {
2839 		return text.replace(tagStart, "").replace(tagEnd, "");
2840 	}
2841 };

2843 /**
2844  * Reconstructs the content of the body area after some sort of change (for example: format,
2845  * signature, or include options).
2846  * 
2847  * @param {string}			action				compose action
2848  * @param {ZmMailMsg}		msg					original msg (in case of reply)
2849  * @param {string}			extraBodyText		canned text to include
2850  * @param {hash}			incOptions			include options
2851  * @param {boolean}			keepAttachments		do not cleanup the attachments
2852  * @param {boolean}			noEditorUpdate		if true, do not change content of HTML editor
2853  */
2854 ZmComposeView.prototype.resetBody =
2855 function(params, noEditorUpdate) {
2856 
2857 	params = params || {};
2858 	var action = params.action || this._origAction || this._action;
2859 	if (this._action === ZmOperation.DRAFT) {
2860 		action = this._origAction;
2861 	}
2862 	var msg = (this._action === ZmOperation.DRAFT) ? this._origMsg : params.msg || this._origMsg;
2863 	var incOptions = params.incOptions || this._controller._curIncOptions;
2864 		
2865 	this._components = {};
2866 	
2867 	this._preserveQuotedText(params.op, params.quotedText);
2868 	if (!params.keepAttachments) {
2869 		this.cleanupAttachments(true);
2870 	}
2871 	this._isDirty = this._isDirty || this.isDirty();
2872 	this._setBody(action, msg, params.extraBodyText, noEditorUpdate, params.keepAttachments);
2873 	this._setFormValue();
2874 	this._resetBodySize();
2875 };

2890 ZmComposeView.prototype._setBodyFieldCursor =
2891 function(extraBodyText) {
2892 
2893 	if (this._composeMode === Dwt.HTML) { return; }
2894 
2895 	// this code moves the cursor to the beginning of the body
2896 	if (AjxEnv.isIE) {
2897 		var tr = this._bodyField.createTextRange();
2898 		if (extraBodyText) {
2899 			tr.move('character', extraBodyText.length + 1);
2900 		} else {
2901 			tr.collapse(true);
2902 		}
2903 		tr.select();
2904 	} else {
2905 		var index = extraBodyText ? (extraBodyText.length + 1) : 0;
2906 		Dwt.setSelectionRange(this._bodyField, index, index);
2907 	}

3099 ZmComposeView.prototype._handleFromListener =
3100 function(ev) {
3101 	var newVal = ev._args.newValue;
3102 	var oldVal = ev._args.oldValue;
3103 	if (oldVal === newVal) { return; }
3104 
3105 	var ac = window.parentAppCtxt || window.appCtxt;
3106 	var newOption = this._fromSelect.getOptionWithValue(newVal);
3107 	var newAccount = ac.accountList.getAccount(newOption.accountId);
3108 	var collection = ac.getIdentityCollection(newAccount);
3109 	var identity = collection && collection.getById(newVal);
3110 
3111 	var sigId = this._getSignatureIdForAction(identity || collection.defaultIdentity) || "";
3112 
3113 	this._controller._accountName = newAccount.name;
3114 	this._controller.resetSignatureToolbar(sigId, newAccount);
3115 	this._controller.resetSignature(sigId, newAccount);
3116 	this._controller._resetReadReceipt(newAccount);
3117 
3118 	// reset account for autocomplete to use
3119 	if (this._acAddrSelectList) {
3120 		this._acAddrSelectList.setActiveAccount(newAccount);
3121 	}
3122 
3123 	// if this message is a saved draft, check whether it needs to be moved
3124 	// based on newly selected value.
3125 	if (this._msg && this._msg.isDraft) {
3126 		var oldOption = this._fromSelect.getOptionWithValue(oldVal);
3127 		var oldAccount = ac.accountList.getAccount(oldOption.accountId);
3128 
3129 		// cache old info so we know what to delete after new save
3130 		var msgId = this._origAcctMsgId = this._msg.id;
3131 
3132 		this._msg = this._origMsg = null;
3133 		var callback = new AjxCallback(this, this._handleMoveDraft, [oldAccount.name, msgId]);
3134 		this._controller.saveDraft(this._controller._draftType, null, null, callback);
3135 	}
3136 
3137 	this._recipients.resetPickerButtons(newAccount);
3138 };

3149 		jsonObj: jsonObj,
3150 		asyncMode: true,
3151 		accountName: accountName
3152 	};
3153 	appCtxt.getAppController().sendRequest(params);
3154 };

3283 ZmComposeView.prototype._progress =
3284 function() {
3285 	var span1 = this._loadingSpan && this._loadingSpan.firstChild;
3286 	var span2 = span1 && span1.nextSibling;
3287     if (span2){
3288         span1.style.width = ((span1.offsetWidth + 1) % span2.offsetWidth) + "px";
3289     }
3290 };

3293  Set the loading progress to a specific percentage
3294  @param {Number} progress - fraction of progress (0 to 1, 1 is 100%).
3295  */
3296 ZmComposeView.prototype._setLoadingProgress =
3297 function(loadingSpan, progress) {
3298 	var finishedSpan = loadingSpan.childNodes[0];
3299 	var allSpan = loadingSpan.childNodes[1];
3300 	finishedSpan.style.width = (allSpan.offsetWidth * progress) + "px";
3301 };

3303 ZmComposeView.prototype._initProgressSpan =
3304 function(fileName) {
3305 	fileName = this._clipFile(fileName, true);
3306 
3307 	var firstBubble = this._attcDiv.getElementsByTagName("span")[0];
3308 	if (firstBubble) {
3309 		var tempBubbleWrapper = document.createElement("span");
3310 		tempBubbleWrapper.innerHTML = AjxTemplate.expand("mail.Message#MailAttachmentBubble", {fileName: fileName});
3311 		var newBubble = tempBubbleWrapper.firstChild;
3312 		firstBubble.parentNode.insertBefore(newBubble, firstBubble); //insert new bubble before first bubble.
3313 	}
3314 	else {
3315 		//first one is enclosed in a wrapper (the template already expands the mail.Message#MailAttachmentBubble template inside the wrapper)
3316 		this._attcDiv.innerHTML = AjxTemplate.expand("mail.Message#UploadProgressContainer", {fileName: fileName});
3317 	}
3318 	this._loadingSpan = this._attcDiv.getElementsByTagName("span")[0];

3322 ZmComposeView.prototype._submitMyComputerAttachments =
3323 function(files, node, isInline) {
3324 	var name = "";
3325 
3326 	if (!AjxEnv.supportsHTML5File) {
3327 		// IE, FF 3.5 and lower
3328 		this.showAttachmentDialog(ZmMsg.myComputer);
3329 		return;
3330 	}
3331 
3332 	if (!files)
3333 		files = node.files;
3334 
3335 	var size = 0;
3336 	if (files) {
3337 		for (var j = 0; j < files.length; j++) {
3338 			var file = files[j];
3339 			//Check the total size of the files we upload this time (we don't know the previously uploaded files total size so we do the best we can).
3340 			//NOTE - we compare to the MTA message size limit since there's no limit on specific attachments.
3341 			size += file.size || file.fileSize; /*Safari*/
3342 			if ((-1 /* means unlimited */ != appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.MESSAGE_SIZE_LIMIT)) &&
3343 				(size > appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.MESSAGE_SIZE_LIMIT))) {
3344 				var msgDlg = appCtxt.getMsgDialog();
3345 				var errorMsg = AjxMessageFormat.format(ZmMsg.attachmentSizeError, AjxUtil.formatSize(appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.MESSAGE_SIZE_LIMIT)));
3346 				msgDlg.setMessage(errorMsg, DwtMessageDialog.WARNING_STYLE);
3347 				msgDlg.popup();
3348 				return false;
3349 			}
3350 		}
3351 	}
3352 
3353 	this._setAttInline(isInline);
3354 	this._initProgressSpan(files[0].name);
3355 
3356 	this._controller._initUploadMyComputerFile(files);
3357 
3358 };

3401 ZmComposeView.prototype._getIdentityOptions =
3402 function() {

3405 	var identities = identityCollection.getIdentities(true);

3413 ZmComposeView.prototype._getIdentityText =
3414 function(identity, account) {
3415 	var name = identity.name;
3416 	if (identity.isDefault && name === ZmIdentity.DEFAULT_NAME) {
3417 		name = account ? account.getDisplayName() : ZmMsg.accountDefault;
3418 	}
3419 
3420 	// default replacement parameters
3421 	var defaultIdentity = appCtxt.getIdentityCollection().defaultIdentity;
3422 	var addr = (identity.sendFromAddressType === ZmSetting.SEND_ON_BEHALF_OF) ? (appCtxt.getUsername() + " " + ZmMsg.sendOnBehalfOf + " " + identity.sendFromAddress) : identity.sendFromAddress;
3423 	var params = [
3424 		name,
3425 		(identity.sendFromDisplay || ""),
3426 		addr,
3427 		ZmMsg.accountDefault,
3428 		appCtxt.get(ZmSetting.DISPLAY_NAME),
3429 		defaultIdentity.sendFromAddress
3430 	];
3431 
3432 	// get appropriate pattern
3433 	var pattern;
3434 	if (identity.isDefault) {
3435 		pattern = ZmMsg.identityTextPrimary;
3436 	}
3437 	else if (identity.isFromDataSource) {
3438 		var ds = appCtxt.getDataSourceCollection().getById(identity.id);
3439 		params[1] = params[1] || ds.userName || "";
3440 		params[2] = ds.getEmail();
3441 		var provider = ZmDataSource.getProviderForAccount(ds);
3442 		if (provider) {
3443 			pattern = ZmMsg["identityText-"+provider.id];
3444 		}
3445 		else if (params[0] && params[1] && params[2] &&
3446 				(params[0] !== params[1] !== params[2]))
3447 		{
3448 			pattern = ZmMsg.identityTextPersona;
3449 		}
3450 		else {
3451 			pattern = ZmMsg.identityTextExternal;
3452 		}
3453 	}
3454 	else {
3455 		pattern = ZmMsg.identityTextPersona;
3456 	}
3457 
3458 	// format text
3459 	return AjxMessageFormat.format(pattern, params);
3460 };

3462 ZmComposeView.prototype._identityChangeListener =
3463 function(ev) {
3464 
3465 	if (!this.identitySelect) { return; }
3466 
3467 	var identity = ev.getDetail("item");
3468 	if (!identity) { return; }
3469 	if (ev.event === ZmEvent.E_CREATE) {
3470 		// TODO: add identity in sort position
3471 		var text = this._getIdentityText(identity);
3472 		var option = new DwtSelectOptionData(identity.id, text);
3473 		this.identitySelect.addOption(option);
3474         this._setIdentityVisible();
3475 	} else if (ev.event === ZmEvent.E_DELETE) {
3476 		this.identitySelect.removeOptionWithValue(identity.id);
3477 		this._setIdentityVisible();
3478 	} else if (ev.event === ZmEvent.E_MODIFY) {
3479 		// TODO: see if it was actually name that changed
3480 		// TODO: re-sort list
3481 		var text = this._getIdentityText(identity);
3482 		this.identitySelect.rename(identity.id, text);
3483 	}
3484 };

3495 ZmComposeView.prototype.getIdentity =
3496 function() {
3497 	var ac = window.parentAppCtxt || window.appCtxt;
3498 
3499 	if (appCtxt.multiAccounts) {
3500 		var newVal = this._fromSelect.getValue();
3501 		var newOption = this._fromSelect.getOptionWithValue(newVal);
3502 		var newAccount = ac.accountList.getAccount(newOption.accountId);
3503 		var collection = ac.getIdentityCollection(newAccount);
3504 		return collection && collection.getById(newVal);
3505 	}
3506 
3507 	if (this.identitySelect) {
3508 		var collection = ac.getIdentityCollection();
3509 		var val = this.identitySelect.getValue();
3510 		var identity = collection.getById(val);
3511 		return identity;
3512 	}

3515 ZmComposeView.prototype._showForwardField =
3516 function(msg, action, incOptions, includeInlineImages, includeInlineAtts) {
3517 
3518 	var html = "";
3519 	var attIncludeOrigLinkId = null;
3520 	this._partToAttachmentMap = [];
3521 	var appCtxt = window.parentAppCtxt || window.appCtxt
3522 	var messages = [];
3523 
3524 	var hasAttachments = msg && msg.attachments && msg.attachments.length > 0;
3525 
3526 	if (!this._originalAttachmentsInitialized) {  //only the first time we determine which attachments are original
3527 		this._originalAttachments = []; //keep it associated by label and size (label => size => true) since that's the only way the client has to identify attachments from previous msg version.
3528 		this._hideOriginalAttachments = msg && hasAttachments && (action === ZmOperation.REPLY || action === ZmOperation.REPLY_ALL);
3529 	}
3530 	if (!(this._msgIds && this._msgIds.length) &&
3531 		((incOptions && incOptions.what === ZmSetting.INC_ATTACH) || action === ZmOperation.FORWARD_ATT))
3532 	{
3533 		html = AjxTemplate.expand("mail.Message#ForwardOneMessage", {message:msg});
3534 		this._attachCount = 1;
3535 	}
3536 	else if (msg && (hasAttachments || includeInlineImages || includeInlineAtts || (action === ZmComposeView.ADD_ORIG_MSG_ATTS)))
3537 	{
3538 		var attInfo = msg.getAttachmentInfo(false, includeInlineImages, includeInlineAtts);
3539 
3540 		if (action === ZmComposeView.ADD_ORIG_MSG_ATTS) {
3541 			if (this._replyAttachments !== this._msg.attachments) {
3542 				attInfo = attInfo.concat(this._replyAttachInfo);
3543 				this._msg.attachments = this._msg.attachments.concat(this._replyAttachments);
3544 			}
3545 				this._replyAttachInfo = this._replyAttachments = [];
3546 				Dwt.setVisible(ZmId.getViewId(this._view, ZmId.CMP_REPLY_ATT_ROW), false);
3547 		} else if (action === ZmOperation.REPLY || action === ZmOperation.REPLY_ALL) {
3548 			if (attInfo && attInfo.length && !appCtxt.isWebClientOffline()) {
3549 				this._replyAttachInfo = attInfo;
3550 				this._replyAttachments = this._msg.attachments;
3551 				this._attachCount = 0;
3552 				Dwt.setVisible(ZmId.getViewId(this._view, ZmId.CMP_REPLY_ATT_ROW), true);
3553 			}
3554 
3555 			return;
3556 		}
3557 
3558 		if (attInfo.length > 0 && !(action === ZmOperation.FORWARD_INLINE && appCtxt.isWebClientOffline())) {
3559 			for (var i = 0; i < attInfo.length; i++) {
3560 				var att = attInfo[i];
3561 				var params = {
3562 					att:		att,
3563 					id:			[this._view, att.part, ZmMailMsgView.ATT_LINK_MAIN].join("_"),
3564 					text:		this._clipFile(att.label),
3565 					mid:		att.mid,
3566 					rfc822Part: att.rfc822Part
3567 				};
3568 				att.link = ZmMailMsgView.getMainAttachmentLinkHtml(params);
3569 				this._partToAttachmentMap[i] = att;
3570 				if (!this._originalAttachmentsInitialized) {
3571 					if (!this._originalAttachments[att.label]) {
3572 						this._originalAttachments[att.label] = [];
3573 					}
3574 					this._originalAttachments[att.label][att.sizeInBytes] = true;
3575 				}
3576 			}
3577 			attIncludeOrigLinkId = Dwt.getNextId(ZmId.getViewId(this._view, ZmId.CMP_ATT_INCL_ORIG_LINK));
3578 
3579 
3580 			if (action === ZmComposeView.ADD_ORIG_MSG_ATTS) {
3581 				action = this._action;
3582 			}
3583 			if (this._msgIds && this._msgIds.length) {
3584 				for (var i = 0; i < this._msgIds.length; i++) {
3585 					var message = appCtxt.cacheGet(this._msgIds[i]);
3586 					if (!message) continue;
3587 					messages.push(message);
3588 				};
3589 			}
3590 
3591 			var data = {
3592 				attachments:				attInfo,
3593 				messages:					messages,
3594 				messagesFwdFieldName: 		(ZmComposeView.FORWARD_MSG_NAME + this._sessionId),
3595 				isNew:						(action === ZmOperation.NEW_MESSAGE),
3596 				isForward:					(action === ZmOperation.FORWARD),
3597 				isForwardInline:			(action === ZmOperation.FORWARD_INLINE),
3598 				isDraft: 					(action === ZmOperation.DRAFT),
3599 				hideOriginalAttachments:	this._hideOriginalAttachments,
3600 				attIncludeOrigLinkId:		attIncludeOrigLinkId,
3601 				originalAttachments: 		this._originalAttachments,
3602 				fwdFieldName:				(ZmComposeView.FORWARD_ATT_NAME + this._sessionId)
3603 			};
3604 			html = AjxTemplate.expand("mail.Message#ForwardAttachments", data);
3605 			this._attachCount = attInfo.length + messages.length;
3606 			this.checkAttachments();
3607 		}
3608 	} else if (this._msgIds && this._msgIds.length) {
3609 		// use main window's appCtxt
3610 		for (var i = 0; i < this._msgIds.length; i++) {
3611 			var message = appCtxt.cacheGet(this._msgIds[i]);
3612 			if (!message) continue;
3613 			messages.push(message);
3614 		}
3615 		var data = {
3616 			messages: messages,
3617 			fwdFieldName: (ZmComposeView.FORWARD_MSG_NAME + this._sessionId)
3618 		};
3619 		html = AjxTemplate.expand("mail.Message#ForwardMessages", data);
3620 		this._attachCount = messages.length;
3621 	}
3622 
3623 	this._originalAttachmentsInitialized  = true; //ok, done setting it for the first time.
3624 
3625 	if (this._attachCount > 0) {
3626 		this._attcDiv.innerHTML = html;
3627 	} else if (!this._loadingSpan) {
3628 		this.cleanupAttachments(true);
3629 	}
3630 
3631 	// include original attachments
3632 	if (attIncludeOrigLinkId) {
3633 		this._attIncludeOrigLinkEl = document.getElementById(attIncludeOrigLinkId);
3634 		if (this._attIncludeOrigLinkEl) {
3635 			Dwt.setHandler(this._attIncludeOrigLinkEl, DwtEvent.ONCLICK, AjxCallback.simpleClosure(this._includeOriginalAttachments, this));
3636 		}
3637 	}
3638 };

3643 	this._isIncludingOriginalAttachments = true;
3644 	this._showForwardField(this._msg, this._action, null, true);
3645 };

3648 // Miscellaneous methods
3649 ZmComposeView.prototype._resetBodySize =
3650 function() {
3651 	if (!this._htmlEditor)
3652 		return;
3653 
3654 	var size = Dwt.insetBounds(this.getInsetBounds(),
3655 	                           this._htmlEditor.getInsets());
3656 
3657 	if (size) {
3658 		size.height -= Dwt.getSize(this._headerEl).y;
3659 
3660 		this._htmlEditor.setSize(size.width, size.height);
3661 	}

3665 ZmComposeView.prototype._setFromSelect =
3666 function(msg) {
3667 	if (!this._fromSelect) { return; }
3668 
3669 	this._fromSelect.clearOptions();
3670 
3671 	var ac = window.parentAppCtxt || window.appCtxt;
3672 	var identity;
3673 	var active = ac.getActiveAccount();
3674 	var accounts = ac.accountList.visibleAccounts;
3675 
3676 	for (var i = 0; i < accounts.length; i++) {
3677 		var acct = accounts[i];
3678 		if (appCtxt.isOffline && acct.isMain) { continue; }
3679 
3680 		var identities = ac.getIdentityCollection(acct).getIdentities();
3681 		if (ac.isFamilyMbox || ac.get(ZmSetting.OFFLINE_SMTP_ENABLED, null, acct)) {
3682 			for (var j = 0; j < identities.length; j++) {
3683 				identity = identities[j];
3684 
3685 				var text = this._getIdentityText(identity, acct);
3686 				var icon = appCtxt.isOffline ? acct.getIcon() : null;
3687 				var option = new DwtSelectOption(identity.id, false, text, null, null, icon);
3688 				option.addr = new AjxEmailAddress(identity.sendFromAddress, AjxEmailAddress.FROM, identity.sendFromDisplay);
3689 				option.accountId = acct.id;
3690 
3691 				this._fromSelect.addOption(option);
3692 			}
3693 		}
3694 	}
3695 
3696 	var selectedIdentity;
3697 	if (msg) {
3698 		var coll = ac.getIdentityCollection(msg.getAccount());
3699 		selectedIdentity = (msg.isDraft)
3700 			? coll.selectIdentity(msg, AjxEmailAddress.FROM)
3701 			: coll.selectIdentity(msg);
3702 		if (!selectedIdentity) {
3703 			selectedIdentity = coll.defaultIdentity;
3704 		}
3705 	}
3706 
3707 	if (!selectedIdentity) {
3708 		selectedIdentity = ac.getIdentityCollection(active).defaultIdentity;
3709 	}
3710 
3711 	if (selectedIdentity && selectedIdentity.id) {
3712 		this._fromSelect.setSelectedValue(selectedIdentity.id);
3713 	}
3714 
3715 	// for cross account searches, the active account isn't necessarily the
3716 	// account of the selected conv/msg so reset it based on the selected option.
3717 	// if active-account is local/main acct, reset it based on selected option.
3718 	if ((appCtxt.getSearchController().searchAllAccounts && this._fromSelect) || active.isMain) {
3719 		active = this.getFromAccount();
3720 		this._controller._accountName = active.name;
3721 	}
3722 
3723 	if (this._acAddrSelectList) {
3724 		this._acAddrSelectList.setActiveAccount(active);
3725 	}
3726 
3727 	this._recipients.resetPickerButtons(active);
3728 };

3732 // Returns a string representing the form content
3733 ZmComposeView.prototype._formValue =
3734 function(incAddrs, incSubject) {
3735 	var vals = [];
3736 	if (incAddrs) {
3737 		for (var i = 0; i < ZmMailMsg.COMPOSE_ADDRS.length; i++) {
3738 			var type = ZmMailMsg.COMPOSE_ADDRS[i];
3739 			if (this._recipients.getUsing(type)) {
3740 				vals.push(this._recipients.getAddrFieldValue(type));
3741 			}
3742 		}
3743 	}
3744 	if (incSubject) {
3745 		vals.push(this._subjectField.value);
3746 	}
3747     var htmlMode = (this._composeMode === Dwt.HTML);
3748     if (!htmlMode) {
3749         var content = this._getEditorContent();
3750         vals.push(content);
3751     }
3752 	var str = vals.join("|");
3753 	str = str.replace(/\|+/, "|");
3754     if (str === "|") {
3755         // No content gets reduced to a single divider, return an empty string
3756         str = "";
3757     }
3758 	return str;
3759 };

3772 // this callback is triggered when an event occurs inside the html editor (when in HTML mode)
3773 // it is used to set focus to the To: field when user hits the TAB key
3774 ZmComposeView.prototype._htmlEditorEventCallback =
3775 function(args) {
3776 	var rv = true;
3777 	if (args.type === "keydown") {
3778 		var key = DwtKeyEvent.getCharCode(args);
3779 		if (key === DwtKeyEvent.KEY_TAB) {
3780 			var toField = this._recipients.getField(AjxEmailAddress.TO);
3781 			if (toField) {
3782 				appCtxt.getKeyboardMgr().grabFocus(toField);
3783 			}
3784 			rv = false;
3785 		}
3786 	}
3787 	return rv;
3788 };

3805 //this is used by several kinds of alert dialogs
3806 ZmComposeView.prototype._popDownAlertAndSendMsg =
3807 function(dialog) {
3808 	// not sure why: popdown (in FF) seems to create a race condition,
3809 	// we can't get the attachments from the document anymore.
3810 	// W/in debugger, it looks fine, but remove the debugger and any
3811 	// alerts, and gotAttachments will return false after the popdown call.
3812 
3813 	if (AjxEnv.isIE) {
3814 		dialog.popdown();
3815 	}
3816 	// bug fix# 3209
3817 	// - hide the dialog instead of popdown (since window will go away anyway)
3818 	if (AjxEnv.isNav && appCtxt.isChildWindow) {
3819 		dialog.setVisible(false);
3820 	}
3821 
3822 	// dont make any calls after sendMsg if child window since window gets destroyed
3823 	if (appCtxt.isChildWindow && !AjxEnv.isNav) {
3824 		// bug fix #68774 Empty warning window when sending message without subject in chrome
3825 		dialog.popdown();
3826 		this._controller.sendMsg();
3827 	} else {
3828 		// bug fix #3251 - call popdown BEFORE sendMsg
3829 		dialog.popdown();
3830 		this._controller.sendMsg();
3831 	}
3832 };

3834 // User has canceled sending message without a subject
3835 ZmComposeView.prototype._noSubjectCancelCallback =
3836 function(dialog) {
3837 	this.enableInputs(true);
3838 	dialog.popdown();
3839 	appCtxt.getKeyboardMgr().grabFocus(this._subjectField);
3840 	this._controller.resetToolbarOperations();
3841 	this.reEnableDesignMode();
3842 };

3900 ZmComposeView.prototype._setAttachedMsgIds =
3901 function(msgIds) {
3902 	if (!this._msgIds) {
3903 		this._msgIds = msgIds;
3904 	} else {
3905 		 for (val in msgIds) {
3906 		   if (AjxUtil.indexOf(this._msgIds, msgIds[val]) === -1) // Do not attach if the same message is forwarded
3907 			 this._msgIds.push(msgIds[val]);
3908 		 }
3909 	}
3910 };

3912 // Files have been uploaded, re-initiate the send with an attachment ID.
3913 ZmComposeView.prototype._attsDoneCallback =
3914 function(isDraft, status, attId, docIds, msgIds) {
3915 	DBG.println(AjxDebug.DBG1, "Attachments: isDraft = " + isDraft + ", status = " + status + ", attId = " + attId);
3916 	this._closeAttachDialog();
3917 	if (status === AjxPost.SC_OK) {
3918 		if (msgIds) {
3919 		  this._setAttachedMsgIds(msgIds);
3920 		}
3921 		var callback = this._resetUpload.bind(this);
3922 		this._startUploadAttachment(); 
3923 		this._controller.saveDraft(ZmComposeController.DRAFT_TYPE_AUTO, attId, docIds, callback);
3924 	} else if (status === AjxPost.SC_UNAUTHORIZED) {
3925 		// auth failed during att upload - let user relogin, continue with compose action
3926 		this._resetUpload(true);
3927 		var ex = new AjxException("401 response during attachment upload", ZmCsfeException.SVC_AUTH_EXPIRED);
3928 		var callback = new AjxCallback(this._controller, isDraft ? this._controller.saveDraft : this._controller._send);
3929 		this._controller._handleException(ex, {continueCallback:callback});
3930 	} else {
3931 		// bug fix #2131 - handle errors during attachment upload.
3932 		this._resetUpload(true);
3933 		this._controller.popupUploadErrorDialog(ZmItem.MSG, status,
3934 		                                        ZmMsg.errorTryAgain);
3935 		this._controller.resetToolbarOperations();
3936 	}
3937 };

3940 //Mandatory Spellcheck Callback
3941 ZmComposeView.prototype._spellCheckShield =
3942 function(words) {
3943 	if (words && words.available && words.misspelled && words.misspelled.length !== 0) {
3944 		var msgDialog = new DwtMessageDialog({parent: appCtxt.getShell(), buttons:[DwtDialog.YES_BUTTON, DwtDialog.NO_BUTTON], id: Dwt.getNextId("SpellCheckConfirm_")});
3945 		msgDialog.setMessage(AjxMessageFormat.format(ZmMsg.misspellingsMessage, [words.misspelled.length]), DwtMessageDialog.WARNING_STYLE);
3946 		msgDialog.registerCallback(DwtDialog.YES_BUTTON, this._spellCheckShieldOkListener, this, [ msgDialog, words ] );
3947 		msgDialog.registerCallback(DwtDialog.NO_BUTTON, this._spellCheckShieldCancelListener, this, msgDialog);
3948 		msgDialog.associateEnterWithButton(DwtDialog.NO_BUTTON);
3949 		msgDialog.getButton(DwtDialog.YES_BUTTON).setText(ZmMsg.correctSpelling);
3950 		msgDialog.getButton(DwtDialog.NO_BUTTON).setText(ZmMsg.sendAnyway);
3951 		var composeView = this;
3952 		msgDialog.handleKeyAction = function(actionCode, ev) { if (actionCode && actionCode==DwtKeyMap.CANCEL) { composeView._spellCheckShieldOkListener(msgDialog, words, ev); return(true); } };
3953 		msgDialog.popup(null, DwtDialog.NO_BUTTON);
3954 	} else {
3955 		this._spellCheckOkay = true;
3956 		this._controller.sendMsg();
3957 	}
3958 };
3959 
3960 ZmComposeView.prototype._spellCheckShieldOkListener =
3961 function(msgDialog, words, ev) {
3962 
3963 	this._controller._toolbar.enableAll(true);
3964 	this.enableInputs(true);
3965 	this._controller.toggleSpellCheckButton(true);
3966 	this._htmlEditor.discardMisspelledWords();
3967 
3968 	this._spellCheckOkay = false;
3969 	msgDialog.popdown();
3970 
3971 	this._htmlEditor.onExitSpellChecker = new AjxCallback(this._controller, this._controller.toggleSpellCheckButton, true)
3972 	this._htmlEditor._spellCheckCallback(words);
3973 };
3974 
3975 ZmComposeView.prototype._spellCheckShieldCancelListener =
3976 function(msgDialog, ev) {
3977 	this._spellCheckOkay = true;
3978 	msgDialog.popdown();
3979 	this._controller.sendMsg();
3980 };
3981 
3982 ZmComposeView.prototype._spellCheckErrorShield =
3983 function(ex) {
3984 	var msgDialog = appCtxt.getYesNoMsgDialog();
3985 	msgDialog.setMessage(ZmMsg.spellCheckFailed);
3986 	msgDialog.registerCallback(DwtDialog.YES_BUTTON, this._spellCheckErrorShieldOkListener, this, msgDialog );
3987 	msgDialog.registerCallback(DwtDialog.NO_BUTTON, this._spellCheckErrorShieldCancelListener, this, msgDialog);
3988 	msgDialog.associateEnterWithButton(DwtDialog.NO_BUTTON);
3989 	msgDialog.popup(null, DwtDialog.NO_BUTTON);
3990 
3991 	return true;
3992 };

4093 /**
4094  * Moves the cursor to the beginning of the editor.
4095  * 
4096  * @param {number}		delay			timer delay in ms
4097  * @param {number}		offset			number of characters to skip ahead when placing cursor
4098  * 
4099  * @private
4100  */
4101 ZmComposeView.prototype._moveCaretOnTimer =
4102 function(offset, delay) {
4103 
4104 	delay = (delay !== null) ? delay : 200;
4105 	var len = this._getEditorContent().length;
4106 	AjxTimedAction.scheduleAction(new AjxTimedAction(this, function() {
4107 		if (this._getEditorContent().length === len) {
4108 			this.getHtmlEditor().moveCaretToTop(offset);
4109 		}
4110 	}), delay);
4111 };

4114 /**
4115  * @overview
4116  * This class is used to manage the creation of a composed message, without a UI. For example,
4117  * it an be used to reply to a msg with some canned or user-provided text.
4118  * 
4119  * @param controller
4120  * @param composeMode
4121  */
4122 ZmHiddenComposeView = function(controller, composeMode) {
4123 	// no need to invoke parent ctor since we don't need to create a UI
4124 	this._controller = controller;
4125 	this._composeMode = composeMode;
4126 	this.reset();
4127 };
4128 
4129 ZmHiddenComposeView.prototype = new ZmComposeView;
4130 ZmHiddenComposeView.prototype.constructor = ZmHiddenComposeView;
4131 
4132 ZmHiddenComposeView.prototype.isZmHiddenComposeView = true;
4133 ZmHiddenComposeView.prototype.toString = function() { return "ZmHiddenComposeView"; };
4134 
4135 /**
4136  * Sets the current view, based on the given action. The compose form is
4137  * created and laid out and everything is set up for interaction with the user.
4138  *
4139  * @param {Hash}		params			a hash of parameters:
4140  * @param {constant}	action				new message, reply, or forward
4141  * @param {ZmMailMsg}	msg					the original message (reply/forward), or address (new message)
4142  * @param {ZmIdentity}	identity			identity of sender
4143  * @param {String}		toOverride			To: addresses (optional)
4144  * @param {String}		ccOverride			Cc: addresses (optional)
4145  * @param {String}		subjectOverride		subject for new msg (optional)
4146  * @param {String}		extraBodyText		text for new msg
4147  * @param {String}		accountName			on-behalf-of From address
4148  */
4149 ZmHiddenComposeView.prototype.set =
4150 function(params) {
4151 
4152 	this.reset();
4153 		
4154 	var action = this._action = params.action;
4155 	var msg = this._msg = this._origMsg = params.msg;
4156 
4157 	if (!ZmComposeController.IS_FORWARD[action]) {
4158 		this._setAddresses(action, AjxEmailAddress.TO, params.toOverride);
4159 		if (params.ccOverride) {
4160 			this._setAddresses(action, AjxEmailAddress.CC, params.ccOverride);
4161 		}
4162 		if (params.bccOverride) {
4163 			this._setAddresses(action, AjxEmailAddress.BCC, params.bccOverride);
4164 		}
4165 	}
4166 	this._setSubject(action, msg, params.subjectOverride);
4167 	this._setBody(action, msg, params.extraBodyText, true);
4168 	var oboMsg = msg || (params.selectedMessages && params.selectedMessages.length && params.selectedMessages[0]);
4169 	var obo = this._getObo(params.accountName, oboMsg);
4170 		
4171 	if (action !== ZmOperation.FORWARD_ATT) {
4172 		this._saveExtraMimeParts();
4173 	}
4174 };

4177 function(composeMode) {
4178 	this._composeMode = composeMode;
4179 };

4189 /**
4190  * Returns a msg created from prior input.
4191  */
4192 ZmHiddenComposeView.prototype.getMsg =
4193 function() {
4194 
4195 	var addrs = this._recipients.collectAddrs();
4196 	var subject = this._subject;
4197 
4198 	// Create Msg Object - use dummy if provided
4199 	var msg = new ZmMailMsg();
4200 	msg.setSubject(subject);
4201 
4202 	this.sendUID = (new Date()).getTime();
4203 
4204 	// build MIME
4205 	var top = this._getTopPart(msg, false, this._bodyContent[this._composeMode]);
4206 
4207 	msg.setTopPart(top);
4208 	msg.setSubject(subject);
4209 
4210     //vcard signature may be set
4211     if (this._msg && this._msg._contactAttIds) {
4212         msg.setContactAttIds(this._msg._contactAttIds);
4213         this._msg.setContactAttIds([]);
4214     }
4215 
4216 	for (var i = 0; i < ZmMailMsg.COMPOSE_ADDRS.length; i++) {
4217 		var type = ZmMailMsg.COMPOSE_ADDRS[i];
4218 		var a = addrs[type];
4219 		if (a && a.length) {
4220 			msg.setAddresses(type, AjxVector.fromArray(a));
4221 		}
4222 	}
4223 	msg.identity = this.getIdentity();
4224 	msg.sendUID = this.sendUID;
4225 
4226 	// save a reference to the original message
4227 	msg._origMsg = this._msg;
4228 	if (this._msg && this._msg._instanceDate) {
4229 		msg._instanceDate = this._msg._instanceDate;
4230 	}
4231 
4232 	this._setMessageFlags(msg);
4233 
4234 	return msg;
4235 };

4243 	this._controller._curIncOptions = null;
4244 	this._msgAttId = null;
4245 	this._addresses = {};
4246 	this._bodyContent = {};
4247 	this._components = {};
4248 	this._quotedTextChanged = false;
4249 
4250 	// remove extra mime parts
4251 	this._extraParts = null;
4252 };

4264 /**
4265  * Minimal version of ZmRecipients that has no UI. Note that addresses are stored in
4266  * arrays rather than vectors.
4267  */
4268 ZmHiddenRecipients = function() {
4269 	this._addresses = {};
4270 };
4271 
4272 ZmHiddenRecipients.prototype.setAddress =
4273 function(type, addr) {
4274 	if (type && addr) {
4275 		this._addresses[type] = this._addresses[type] || [];
4276 		this._addresses[type].push(addr);
4277 	}
4278 };
4279 
4280 ZmHiddenRecipients.prototype.addAddresses =
4281 function(type, addrVec, used) {
4282 
4283 	var addrAdded = false;
4284 	used = used || {};
4285 	var addrs = AjxUtil.toArray(addrVec);
4286 	if (addrs && addrs.length) {
4287 		if (!this._addresses[type]) {
4288 			this._addresses[type] = [];
4289 		}
4290 		for (var i = 0, len = addrs.length; i < len; i++) {
4291 			var addr = addrs[i];
4292 			addr = addr.isAjxEmailAddress ? addr : AjxEmailAddress.parse(addr);
4293 			if (addr) {
4294 				var email = addr.getAddress();
4295 				if (!email) { continue; }
4296 				email = email.toLowerCase();
4297 				if (!used[email]) {
4298 					this._addresses[type].push(addr);
4299 					used[email] = true;
4300 					addrAdded = true;
4301 				}
4302 			}
4303 		}
4304 	}
4305 	return addrAdded;
4306 };
4307 
4308 ZmHiddenRecipients.prototype.collectAddrs =
4309 function() {
4310 	return this._addresses;
4311 };
